description-en_US-print: 12-megapixel resolution Step up to DSLR image quality with a 12-megapixel APS-C-sized sensor. A 14-bit DIGIC 4 image processor provides up to 3.2fps continuous shooting and images that are packed with detail and tonal range. Intuitive, on-screen feature guide The EOS 1100D’s Feature Guide provides descriptions of many of the camera’s functions, as well as advice on how to use them in your own photography. Easy to use Scene modes and Basic+ Theme-based Scene modes automatically pick the most suitable exposure, focus and drive-mode settings for the subject being photographed, while Creative Auto mode portrays adjustable functions in an easy to understand way. With Canon’s Basic + technology, the look and feel of these basic auto modes can be fine-tuned according to ambience and lighting type. HD EOS Movie mode Shoot stunning HD video at 25 or 30fps, with automatic exposure control leaving you free to concentrate on the action. Footage can be edited on your PC or Mac, or played directly on an HD TV via the camera’s HDMI connection. ISO 100-6400 sensitivity Low-light shooting without flash is possible thanks to the EOS 1100D’s ISO 100-6400 sensitivity range. The camera’s 14-bit DIGIC 4 processor helps to control noise and maintain image quality. Wide-area 9-point AF system The EOS 1100D focuses quickly and accurately on static and moving subjects, thanks to nine AF points, spread out across the frame. A central cross-type AF point is sensitive to both horizontal and vertical lines. 63-zone iFCL exposure metering Advanced iFCL exposure metering dissects a scene into 63-zones before analyzing it to find the perfect combination of shutter speed, aperture and ISO. 6.8cm (2.7”), 230,000-dot LCD screen Compose and review images on a large 230,000-dot LCD screen, which also provides access to the camera’s menu system and Quick Control Screen. Use with all EF and EF-S lenses The EOS 1100D is supported by the complete range of EOS lenses and accessories: flashguns, remote releases and a system of more than 60 lenses trusted by professional photographers the world over.
description-en_US-mobile: 1100D + EF-S 18-55mm + DVD + ACC - 22.2 x 14.7mm CMOS, 12.2MP, 3:2, DIGIC 4, EF/EF-S, TTL-CT-SIR, 6.858 cm (2.7 ") TFT, USB 2.0, PAL/ NTSC, HDMI mini, SD, SDHC, SDXC, 495g
name: Canon EOS 1100D + EF-S 18-55mm + DVD + ACC

description-en_US-print: F2.0-2.8 Fujinon Optical 4x Zoom Lens (28-112mm) The X10 features a newly developed manual 4x optical zoom lens utilizing Fujinon optical technology. With superb F2.0-2.8 brightness and a 4x optical zoom ranging from 28mm wide angle to 112mm telephoto, the lens not only delivers high resolution optical performance across the entire range, but is also a triumph of engineering due to its compact size. Boasting rich descriptive performance, the all-purpose lens captures your encounters with amazing presence. In order to maintain the X10's compact shell whilst ensuring high image quality, Fujinon has adopted lenses made of glass with superior optical characteristics for all elements in the 9-groups/11-elements configuration. The design incorporates an arrangement of aspheric lenses, ED lenses and high-refractive index lenses, and are treated with Fujinon's originally developed Super EBC (Electron Beam Coating). 3 Aspherical Lenses - For Rich Resolution and a Compact Form By using 3 high-performance aspherical lenses, the X10 delivers sharp image quality with rich resolution. These lenses also contribute to a more compact overall lens configuration and the X10's compact body size ensuring you can easily take it everywhere with you. ED Lens - Removing All Color Fringing Even at High Magnification Two ED lenses have been employed for their low dispersion and effective reduction of chromatic aberrations. By preventing color fringing and reducing contrast, the X10 lens captures images with superb accuracy across the zoom range from wide angle to telephoto. High Resolution Across the Entire Zoom Range From wide angle to telephoto, and from the centre of the image to the edges, the X10 fully exploits the advantages of its bright lens and demonstrates its superb resolution with the aperture at its widest setting. The X10's optical performance is designed to capture images with exceptional sharpness of detail and color fidelity in every scene. Super EBC - Aiming for High Quality Images All the lens elements used in the X10 have been treated with multilayer Super EBC (Electron Beam Coating), the same process used for Fujinon broadcasting video lenses and large-format camera lenses acclaimed by professionals. Reducing ghosting and lens flare, the treatment promises clear image quality.
description-en_US-mobile: FinePix X10, 12MP, 2/3" CMOS, 4000 x 3000, 4x Optical zoom, 7.112 cm (2.8 ") TFT LCD, Full HD, NTSC/PAL, USB 2.0, HDMI, 350g, Black
name: Fujifilm FinePix X10

description-en_US-print: Looking to take outstanding photos? Then look for the unexpected angles! Presenting the Samsung MV800 with the Flip-out Display, the camera that lets you easily capture life in ways you never could before. With the MV800’s wide range of features, you can approach the shot from every direction, and explore every artistic possibility. Shoot from overhead or from down low — you’ll add a dynamic sense of drama you simply can’t find in a picture taken straight on. Then use the Flip-out Display as a kickstand to prop up the camera, and instantly play back your brilliant shots for everybody to enjoy. The Flip-out Display - Life, from all angles Easily capture your unique perspective. The MV800’s 3.0" Display flips up and down so you can frame shots at any angle without having to twist your body or bend your back. Snap a high-angle shot over a crowd to effortlessly capture a street performance, or get waist-level candids of your dog. Take low angle shots without getting on the ground, or spin the display all the way around for dazzling self-portraits.The LCD lets you stand the camera so everyone can enjoy from a comfortable position. Life’s more fun when you can cover all the angles. Stylish design that captures your imagination Engineered for the style-conscious, the MV800 has a slim, sleek, minimalist form that’s as impressive as its photographic functions. From the bolts to the lens barrel, the camera’s striking, sensuous front case is uniformly crafted from shimmering metal. All complements by the stunning 3.0" touchscreen. Elevate your photography with high picture quality Whether you’re hitting the boutiques with friends, or enjoying mocha lattes and conversation at a café, capture the moment perfectly with the high-res quality of 16.1 mega pixels. But don’t stop there: the 5x optical zoom lets you get up close to get even closer to your friends . And should a whole group of friends decide to join you, get them all in the picture too — the MV800 features a 26mm wide-angle lens that lets you go really wide to ensure you get every smile in the picture. Personalise your home screen with Smart touch 3.0 If you already have a smartphone with a touchscreen, then you’ll feel right at home with the MV800’s interface — and right at home with the wallpaper you choose. Smart Touch 3.0 lets you drag and scroll through menu options intuitively and effortlessly to launch the feature you want — with one touch. And it’s your camera — so put your personal stamp on the display with customisable wallpaper. The MV800 comes with great backgrounds to choose from — or, for even more fun, personalise the wallpaper with your current favorite image. Then show it off to anyone, anytime! Show both side of the story with picture in picture shot Why settle for one picture when you can have two at the same time? Picture in Picture Shot lets you insert one image within another, to capture the full, glorious story you want to share. Snap a picture of a friend bowling a strike, then combine it with an image of everyone cheering the score. Adjust the size and position of the smaller picture to create endless variations. See what you're going to get with Live panorama With Live Panorama, you can practically capture the whole wide world without having to step back! Live Panorama lets you see the final image in advance, so you know you’re getting the picture you want. It’s as simple as holding down the shutter button and sweeping the camera across the scene. Bring on the laughter with funny face Who needs a funhouse mirror when you have the MV800 handy? The Funny Face feature lets you bend, stretch and warp the portraits of friends and family to hilarious effect. Simply tap the screen to enlarge heads or noses, or drag your fingers across the screen to radically distort faces. Face Tracking ensures that the distorted face remains the same, even if you move the camera. Add hocus pocus to your photo with Magic Frame Make a portrait look like an antique, or put your face on a rising moon — Magic Frame’s 12 background templates offer lots of picture-taking enjoyment. You can even rub an area of a photo to create your own Magic Frame, and insert another image. Add your friend to a group shot or add yourself to a crowd. There are many possibilities for fun — especially when you share the poster-quality results! More fun, more artistry with Smart Filter Boost creative fun with Smart Filter 3.0 — right on the display! Cartoon Filter makes any photo look like an animated film scene while Cross Filter makes light sources appear to have several points of light, like stars. And Zooming Shot adds motion lines to make it look like you’re speeding towards your subject. There’s also Water Paint, Oil Painting, Half-tone Dot — and more!
description-en_US-mobile: MV800, 16.1 MP, max. 4608 x 3456, CCD, TTL AF, 5x OZ, Program AE, Auto WB, 10MB, Micro SD/MicroSDHC, HDMI, USB 2.0, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") rotating LCD, 121g
name: Samsung MV 800

description-en_US-print: Alluring Photos, Powerful HD Shoot your everyday moments from beautiful photos to HD movies. Supported by our award-winning Fujinon Lens, images can be captured sharp and crisp just as it appears. Easy-to-use Intelligent Shooting Modes Simple shooting modes allow you to capture the best of any scene with versatility. The widely popular Motion Panorama creates stunning wide-scale images by simply sweeping the camera right or left. SR AUTO & Detection Functions Equipped with SR AUTO, an auto 6 scene-recognition function, with fully loaded detection functions that detect faces, blinks and smiles for clear optimized people photos. Post Capture Essentials Photo playbacks are simple as it can be! With advanced picture search function, micro thumbnail and slideshow, revive your captured memories.
name: Fujifilm FinePix JV210

description-en_US-print: Imaging processing performance that places a premium on pure image quality. Back-illuminated CMOS sensor + Smooth Imaging Engine IV The CX6 boasts a back-illuminated CMOS image sensor combined with advanced Smooth Imaging Engine IV image processing. Poorly-lit indoor or night scenes are rendered in pure, unblemished quality, as of course are brightly-lit subjects. An output pixel interpolation algorithm residing in dedicated logic circuits in the imaging engine reduces loss of detail in highlights to faithfully recreate high-contrast scenes exactly as they appear to the naked eye. RICOH Pure Image Quality Technology The imaging philosophy that lies at the root of all Ricoh digital cameras: not just "high image quality" but "pure image quality, true to what is perceived by the naked eye." This is achieved through three core technologies—a low-distortion lens with true-to-life imaging properties, an image sensor with superior high-sensitivity performance, and an imaging engine that reproduces images in minute detail—that have been designed and developed as a single mechanism, offering unsurpassed resolution and faithful, unaffected color reproduction. Breathtakingly pure beauty with each shot. Breakthrough noise reduction function The camera's noise reduction algorithm processes the image signal as it is output from the CMOS image sensor, reducing the image noise that tends to occur in photographs taken at high sensitivities. The result is beautiful, limpid photographs with details, tones, and colors as vivid as those seen in the original subject. Super-resolution technology for high-resolution image quality for everything from normal photography to zoom and macro shooting. The CX6's super-resolution technology discerns the outlines, details, and gradations in the image automatically and processes the photograph based on the optimal settings for each. This allows the camera to record images with even higher resolution than with previous models. Corrects for even slight hand-motion blur. Image sensor shift image stabilizer The image sensor shift image stabilizer function reduces the hand-motion blurring that tends to occur in situations such as telephoto and macro shooting. When blurring is detected, the CMOS sensor automatically compensates by shifting in a direction that eliminates the blur.
description-en_US-mobile: 10MP, 1/2.3" CMOS, 7.62 cm (3 ") LCD, 3648 x 2736, SD/SDHC, USB 2.0, black
description-de_DE-print: Leistungsstarke Bildverarbeitung mit Schwerpunkt auf unverfälschter Bildqualität. Rückseitig belichteter CMOS-Sensor + Bildprozessor Smooth Imaging Engine IV Die CX6 arbeitet mit einem rückseitig belichteten CMOS-Sensor in Kombination mit dem fortschrittlichen Bildprozessor Smooth Imaging Engine IV. Dunkle Innenräume und Nachtmotive werden in makelloser Qualität wiedergegeben, genauso wie stark beleuchtete Objekte. Ein Interpolations-Algorithmus für die Pixel-Ausgabe, der in einem speziellen Schaltkreis des Bildprozessors angesiedelt ist, wirkt gegen Detailverluste in hellsten Bildbereichen. Kontrastreiche Motive werden damit so wiedergegeben, wie man sie mit eigenen Augen wahrnimmt. RICOH Pure Image Quality Technology Die Philosophie, die allen Ricoh-Digitalkameras zugrunde liegt, hat nicht nur "hohe Bildqualität" zum Ziel sondern "unverfälschte Bildqualität, die der Wahrnehmung mit dem Auge gleichkommt". Dies wird durch drei wichtige Komponenten erreicht: ein Objektiv mit fehlerarmer und wirklichkeitsgetreuer Abbildung, ein Bildsensor mit hoher Lichtempfindlichkeit und ein Bildprozessor, der Fotos mit feinsten Details erzeugt. Aneinander angepasst bilden diese Komponenten eine Einheit, die eine unübertroffene Auflösung und wirklichkeitsgetreue Farbwiedergabe liefert. Herrliche Aufnahmen – Bild für Bild. Bedeutender Fortschritt bei der Rauschreduzierung Der Algorithmus zur Verminderung des Bildrauschens nutzt direkt die aus dem CMOS-Bildsensor kommenden Signale, um das gerade bei hoher Empfindlichkeitseinstellung auftretende Rauschen zu reduzieren. Das Ergebnis sind wunderbar klare Aufnahmen mit Details, Tonwerten und lebendigen Farben wie in der Wirklichkeit. * Für die Stärke der Rauschverminderung kann zwischen den Einstellungen Aus, Automatik, Schwach, Stark und MAX gewählt werden. * Die Zeit für das Aufzeichnen eines Bildes differiert mit der gewählten Rauschreduzierungseinstellung. Die Super-Resolution-Technologie sorgt für hochauflösende Bilder in jeder Lage – bei der "normalen" Fotografie, beim Zoomen, bei Makrofotos. Die Super-Resolution-Technologie der CX6 erkennt im Bild automatisch Umrisse, Details und Tonwertstufen und verarbeitet sie mit den jeweils optimalen Einstellungen. Dies erlaubt der Kamera, Bilder mit noch höherer Auflösung als bei den Vorgängermodellen aufzuzeichnen. Kompensiert wackelige Kamerahaltung. Bildstabilisierung mittels Sensor-Shift Die Bildstabilisierungsfunktion verringert die Gefahr von Verwacklungsunschärfen, wie sie besonders bei Tele- und Makro-Aufnahmen auftreten können. Sobald die Kamera unruhiges Halten erkennt, verschiebt sie den CMOS-Sensor gegenläufig, um die Verwacklung auszugleichen.
description-de_DE-mobile: 10MP, 1/2.3" CMOS, 7.62 cm (3 ") LCD, 3648 x 2736, SD/SDHC, USB 2.0, schwarz
name: Ricoh CX 6

description-fr_FR-print:
Avec sa large gamme d’applications, le MV800 vous permettra de repousser vos limites photographiques et décupler votre sens artistique en toute simplicité. Que ce soit en contre-plongée ou en plongée, ajoutez à vos photos un ton théâtral que vous n’auriez pas pu réaliser avec un appareil photo classique et partagez vos chef d’œuvres avec vos amis!
Ecran tactile 3’' pivotant à 180°: A chacun son angle!
Immortalisez, Créez et Revivez les plus beaux moments de votre vie sous tous les angles avec l’écran tactile 3’ pivotant à 180° de votre Samsung MultiView MV800. La vie est tellement plus belle quand on peut en saisir tous les aspects. Si vous avez déjà un Smartphone, l’utilisation du Samsung MultiView MV800 vous sera familière. Avec son Smart Touch 3.0 tactile, naviguez à travers le menu du bout de votre index et faites défiler toutes ses fonctionnalités. C’est avec l’esprit serein que vous utiliserez votre MultiView!
Un appareil photo qui a de la classe!
Le Samsung MultiView MV800 est un appareil photo avec du style! Façonné pour les amateurs de design, ses courbes minimalistes fines et lisses sont tout aussi impressionnantes que ses performances technologiques. En tous points, il vous éblouira de son métal brossé résistant et distingué.
Propulsez la photographie dans une nouvelle dimension!
Avec ses 16.1 Millions de pixels, saisissez parfaitement chaque moment de votre vie et dans n’importe quelles circonstances. Son zoom X5 vous rapprochera toujours plus de l’action alors que son grand angle 26 mm vous permettra d’immortaliser chaque sourire de votre entourage lors de vos photos de groupe. Grâce à ces performances, revivez vos péripéties en 3D à l’aide de votre câble 3D HDTV et contemplez vos œuvres comme si vous y étiez!
Rendez votre appareil photo unique!
Avec l’écran tactile 3’, se déplacer dans les menus devient beaucoup plus fluide et intuitif pour sélectionner la fonction choisie. Pour un appareil à votre image, transformez vos photos favorites en fond d’écran!
Mode Superposition de photos: Des deux côtés de l’action!
Pourquoi se contenter d’une seule photo quand on peut en avoir deux? Le mode Superposition de photos vous permet de capter les deux côtés de l’action et de saisir en une seule photo toute l’intensité du moment. Prenez en photo par exemple votre ami en train de marquer un but et combinez cette image avec le public en train de jubiler.
description-fr_FR-mobile: Qui n’a jamais rêvé de prendre de superbes photos ? Prenez les donc d’un angle de vue insolite avec le Samsung MultiView MV800 (modèle blanc) et son écran tactile pivotable à 180°tactile! Cet appareil photo unique vous permettra de prendre vos photos sous des angles que vous n’auriez jamais imaginés auparavant.
description-en_US-print: Looking to take outstanding photos? Then look for the unexpected angles! Presenting the Samsung MV800 with the Flip-out Display, the camera that lets you easily capture life in ways you never could before. With the MV800’s wide range of features, you can approach the shot from every direction, and explore every artistic possibility. Shoot from overhead or from down low — you’ll add a dynamic sense of drama you simply can’t find in a picture taken straight on. Then use the Flip-out Display as a kickstand to prop up the camera, and instantly play back your brilliant shots for everybody to enjoy. The Flip-out Display - Life, from all angles Easily capture your unique perspective. The MV800’s 3.0" Display flips up and down so you can frame shots at any angle without having to twist your body or bend your back. Snap a high-angle shot over a crowd to effortlessly capture a street performance, or get waist-level candids of your dog. Take low angle shots without getting on the ground, or spin the display all the way around for dazzling self-portraits.The LCD lets you stand the camera so everyone can enjoy from a comfortable position. Life’s more fun when you can cover all the angles. Stylish design that captures your imagination Engineered for the style-conscious, the MV800 has a slim, sleek, minimalist form that’s as impressive as its photographic functions. From the bolts to the lens barrel, the camera’s striking, sensuous front case is uniformly crafted from shimmering metal. All complements by the stunning 3.0" touchscreen. Elevate your photography with high picture quality Whether you’re hitting the boutiques with friends, or enjoying mocha lattes and conversation at a café, capture the moment perfectly with the high-res quality of 16.1 mega pixels. But don’t stop there: the 5x optical zoom lets you get up close to get even closer to your friends . And should a whole group of friends decide to join you, get them all in the picture too — the MV800 features a 26mm wide-angle lens that lets you go really wide to ensure you get every smile in the picture. Personalise your home screen with Smart touch 3.0 If you already have a smartphone with a touchscreen, then you’ll feel right at home with the MV800’s interface — and right at home with the wallpaper you choose. Smart Touch 3.0 lets you drag and scroll through menu options intuitively and effortlessly to launch the feature you want — with one touch. And it’s your camera — so put your personal stamp on the display with customisable wallpaper. The MV800 comes with great backgrounds to choose from — or, for even more fun, personalise the wallpaper with your current favorite image. Then show it off to anyone, anytime! Show both side of the story with picture in picture shot Why settle for one picture when you can have two at the same time? Picture in Picture Shot lets you insert one image within another, to capture the full, glorious story you want to share. Snap a picture of a friend bowling a strike, then combine it with an image of everyone cheering the score. Adjust the size and position of the smaller picture to create endless variations. See what you're going to get with Live panorama With Live Panorama, you can practically capture the whole wide world without having to step back! Live Panorama lets you see the final image in advance, so you know you’re getting the picture you want. It’s as simple as holding down the shutter button and sweeping the camera across the scene. Bring on the laughter with funny face Who needs a funhouse mirror when you have the MV800 handy? The Funny Face feature lets you bend, stretch and warp the portraits of friends and family to hilarious effect. Simply tap the screen to enlarge heads or noses, or drag your fingers across the screen to radically distort faces. Face Tracking ensures that the distorted face remains the same, even if you move the camera. Add hocus pocus to your photo with Magic Frame Make a portrait look like an antique, or put your face on a rising moon — Magic Frame’s 12 background templates offer lots of picture-taking enjoyment. You can even rub an area of a photo to create your own Magic Frame, and insert another image. Add your friend to a group shot or add yourself to a crowd. There are many possibilities for fun — especially when you share the poster-quality results! More fun, more artistry with Smart Filter Boost creative fun with Smart Filter 3.0 — right on the display! Cartoon Filter makes any photo look like an animated film scene while Cross Filter makes light sources appear to have several points of light, like stars. And Zooming Shot adds motion lines to make it look like you’re speeding towards your subject. There’s also Water Paint, Oil Painting, Half-tone Dot — and more! 3D Photo 3D Photo makes every picture stand out in stunning 3D glory. Just hook the camera up to a 3D HDTV to display both still images and panoramic photos with incredible depth and dimension. Now you can immerse yourself in memories like never before. Pose Guide Use the Pose Guide function to show your subjects just how to position themselves for the perfect shot. Select from a gallery of posed models on the LCD screen, and then have your subject match the pose. Portrait success in a snap! Photo Editor The easy-to-navigate Photo Editor lets you rotate images, add effects, and crop out distracting elements in the background — all on the display. There’s also the Beauty Shot feature you can use to edit out facial imperfections, like blemishes. Storyboard Maker Create storyboards for film or other creative efforts. Simply choose the template you want, and place your shots into the layout. A virtual keyboard lets you add text — then see your story clearly laid out on the display! HD Movie with ZNR Crystal-clear video deserves crystal-clear sound. HD Movie with Zoom Noise Reduction (ZNR) automatically adjusts and optimises the sound when recording in HD, and even eliminates the whirring noise of the zoom function. Your ears will thank you. Intelligent Portrait Take three different pictures of the same scene, at the same time, with Intelligent Portrait. Snap a wide-angle shot of a friend and the camera captures two other good angles and compositions — you get three great shots for one click.
description-en_US-mobile: MV800 - 16.44MP, CCD, 4608 x 3456, 5x Optical Zoom, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") TFT LCD, 10MB, NTSC/PAL, HDMI, USB 2.0, 121g, White
name: Samsung MV 800

description-en_US-print: Twice the fun with Dual LCDs The effortless way to get perfect pictures, Samsung’s 2View PL120 has a generous 1.5” front-side display so you’re part of every image. Preview self-portraits, then click, with you in the frame __ easy. Flip the camera around to enjoy photos on the wide 2.7” display. New features change the view on hard to-capture experiences. Children Mode has built-in and downloadable animation options to keep kids’ attention. Jump Shot offers cues before taking two continuous shot. Self-Timer is a visual countdown to coordinate group shots so everyone smiles at the results. Quickly pressing the top display on / off button efficiently manages power. From now on, no more out of the frame glitches. No more babies caught crying. You will never have more fun with other cameras. Get a whole new view Get more from your lens, whether shooting a memorable landscape or the gang’s reunion around a restaurant table. By using the precision-cut PL120 26mm wide-angle lens, with its 5x optical zoom, you instantly cover a whole-horizon field of view. Now, you can now capture full-scale memories of landmarks and landscapes, entire wedding parties and the tallest skyscrapers. Invent new looks for your images Samsung’s Smart Filter lens and color options make special moods easy for still shots and videos. Tilt & Shift Lens Effect adds a miniaturised look and the Vignetting Effect makes striking compositional contrasts. New special effects include Soft Focus to soften colours and add an emotional feel as well as Half-Tone Dot to enhance images with a comic-book look. Palette Effect adds an ultra-vivid vibe and a variety of colour options for your images. It’s now a snap to get creative. Edit your own special effects The unique Magic Frame feature allows you to create sophisticated images and poster-quality visuals that express your mood and personality. Just select one of the built-in Magic Frame templates, including Wall Art, Old Film, Ripple, Full Moon, Old Record, Magazine, Holiday, Classic TV and more. Point the camera at the subject you want, match it within the on-screen template and capture. That’s it. Your subject now is framed by a special mood and background – like magic. HD quality video. Now in a compact camera The PL120 artfully combines a professional-grade still camera with a compact HD video camera. You get 720p HD quality video at 30 frames per second. Use the 5x zoom to get up close and vividly personal. The simple way to go pro Turn any moment into a perfect memory. And a professional-looking photo. Whether it's a few friends from last night's party or the moon reflecting off the lake, Smart Auto 2.0 (Still & Movie) instantly analyzes key elements of your composition then automatically adjusts to capture the perfect shot with multitude of different photo modes and movie modes. And since life isn't a still life, the camera's object tracking feature captures those subjects that just don't, or won't, stand still.
name: Samsung PL 120

description-fr_FR-mobile: Faites des photos nettes grâce à cet appareil photo de 5 MP simple à utiliser. Rapprochez-vous avec le zoom optique 3x, prévisualisez les photos sur l'écran lumineux 6 cm et appuyez, c'est aussi simple que cela. Utilisez le mode de stabilisation HP et la fonction intégrée de suppression de l'effet « yeux rouges » pour obtenir de superbes photos.
description-en_US-print: Be sure of crisp, clear photos with this fully-equipped, easy-to-use 5 MP camera. Get up close with 3x optical zoom, preview on the bright 6 cm display and snap – it’s as easy as that. Intuitive buttons and menus help you make the most of this camera’s easy-to-use features, including video recording. Enjoy sharp, blur-free photos with HP steady photo anti-shake mode and make sure your subjects look their best with industry-leading in-camera red-eye removal[p1]. Windows Vista™ ready.
description-en_US-mobile: Get crisp, clear photos with this easy-to-use 5 MP camera. Zoom in with 3x optical, preview on the bright 6 cm display and snap – it’s as easy as that. Use HP anti-shake mode and in-camera red-eye removal for results you’ll be proud to share.
description-de_DE-print: Mit dieser voll ausgestatteten, bedienerfreundlichen 5-MP-Kamera sind gestochen scharfe Fotos garantiert. Das Motiv mit dem 3x optischen Zoom heranholen, auf dem hellen 6 cm Display betrachten und den Auslöser betätigen – das ist schon alles. Intuitive Tasten und Menüs sorgen für eine einfache Bedienung aller Funktionen der Kamera, einschließlich Videoaufnahme. Mit der HP Stabilisierungsfunktion gegen Verwackeln sind gestochen scharfe Fotos garantiert, und die branchenweit führende Red-Eye Removal-Funktion[p1] setzt die fotografierten Personen ins rechte Licht. Geeignet für Windows Vista™.
description-de_DE-mobile: Mit dieser 5-MP-Kamera erhalten Sie gestochen scharfe Fotos. Das Motiv mit dem 3x optischen Zoom heranholen, auf dem hellen 6 cm Display betrachten und den Auslöser betätigen, das war's. Die HP Stabilisierungsfunktion und die integrierte Red-Eye Removal-Funktion sorgen für optimale Ergebnisse.
name: HP Photosmart M447 Digital Camera

description-fr_FR-print: HS System (12,1 millions de pixels) Le HS System est particulièrement performant en conditions de faible éclairage : vous pouvez restituer l'atmosphère réelle de l'instant sans utiliser de flash ou de trépied. Son processeur DIGIC 4 hautes performances et son capteur d'image haute sensibilité assurent une qualité d'image optimale dans toutes les situations. Zoom grand-angle de 28 mm avec coefficient de 14x et stabilisateur d'image optique Le zoom grand-angle avec coefficient de 14x en téléobjectif jusqu'à 392 mm* (*équivalent en 24x36) permet d'obtenir précisément le cadrage souhaité, qu'il s'agisse de paysages panoramiques ou de sujets distants. Avec le stabilisateur d'image optique 4 vitesses, vous pouvez désormais effectuer des prises de vues avec 4 vitesses de moins pour obtenir des photos sans flou de bougé. Full HD avec zoom optique. Stabilisateur dynamique et son stéréo Vous pouvez maintenant enregistrer des vidéos de qualité supérieure au format Full HD 1080p avec son stéréo. Utilisez le zoom optique pour les vidéos et le stabilisateur pour réduire l'effet de tremblement et le flou de bougé lorsque vous vous déplacez en filmant. Grand écran LCD PureColor II G de 7,5 cm (3 pouces) Les images sont faciles à cadrer grâce au grand écran LCD PureColor II G haute résolution de 7,5 cm (3 pouces). La protection par un verre trempé renforce sa résistance et offre une excellente visibilité dans toutes les conditions d'éclairage. Mode "Smart Auto" Le mode "Smart Auto" est entièrement automatique : il détecte jusqu'à 32 types de scènes et prend en charge tous les réglages pour vous permettre d'enregistrer de belles photos en toute confiance et d'apprécier l'instant présent. Modes rafale grande vitesse et super ralenti en vidéo Vous pouvez au choix figer des actions rapides à l'aide du mode rafale grande vitesse ou ralentir le mouvement avec le mode super ralenti en vidéo. Ces deux modes produisent des effets spectaculaires pour enregistrer les sujets qui se déplacent rapidement. Fonction de pré-enregistrement vidéo et mode d'enregistrement Vidéo iFrame La fonction de pré-enregistrement vidéo enregistre jusqu'à 4 secondes d'action avant la prise de vues effective et réunit toutes les séquences réalisées le même jour en une vidéo VGA que vous pouvez ajouter à votre collection de photos. Avec le format vidéo iFrame, vous pouvez rapidement importer, retoucher et partager des vidéos en toute simplicité. Contrôle manuel Avec les modes Av et Tv semi-automatiques et le mode entièrement manuel, le PowerShot SX220 HS vous offre la possibilité de contrôler un seul paramètre de l'exposition ou d'en contrôler tous les aspects et de laisser libre cours à votre imagination. Boîtier étanche Le boîtier étanche en option (WP-DC42) vous permet de plonger avec l'appareil à une profondeur de 40 mètres ou de le protéger de la poussière, de la saleté ou des intempéries.
description-fr_FR-mobile: PowerShot SX220 HS - 12.1MP, 1/2.3" CMOS, 4000 x 3000, DIGIC 4, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") LCD TFT, 14x Optical zoom, USB 2.0, HDMI, 215g
description-en_US-print: Packing HS System for stunning images in all situations, a wide-angle 14x optical zoom and Full HD movies, the PowerShot SX220 HS is a powerful combination of leading image quality and flexibility. Features - HS System (12.1 MP) - 28mm, 14x zoom. Optical IS - Full HD with optical zoom. Dynamic IS - Wide 7.5 cm (3.0") PureColor II G LCD - Smart Auto (32 scenes) - High-speed Burst & Super Slow Motion Movie - Movie Digest & iFrame movie - Manual Control - Waterproof Case - Travel light with the camera that packs everything. HS System (12.1 MP) HS System excels in low light allowing you to capture the real atmosphere of the moment without the need for flash or a tripod. A high performance DIGIC 4 processor and high sensitivity image sensor give superior image quality in all situations. 28mm with 14x zoom and Optical IS A wide-angle lens with a huge 14x telephoto reach of up to 392mm* (*35mm equiv.) allows you to frame exactly the shot you want, whether shooting panoramic landscapes or zooming in on distant subjects. The optical Image Stabilizer provides a 4-stop benefit so you can shoot 4 shutter steps slower than would otherwise be necessary to achieve a blur-free shot. Full HD with optical zoom. Dynamic IS and Stereo sound High quality movies can now be recorded in Full HD 1080p format with stereo sound. The optical zoom can be used for filming while Dynamic IS reduces the effect of shake and movement while shooting on the move. Wide 7.5 cm (3.0") PureColor II G LCD Images are easy to frame thanks to a large 7.5 cm (3.0”) high resolution PureColor II G LCD. A tempered glass outer layer offers increased strength and excellent visibility in all lighting conditions. Smart Auto Smart Auto is truly automatic - detecting up to 32 different shooting scenes so you can take great pictures in complete confidence, knowing that the camera will take care of everything, leaving you free to enjoy the moment. High-speed Burst & Super Slow Motion Movie Capture fast-paced action using the High-speed Burst mode or slow down movement using Super Slow Motion Movie mode. Both modes provide dramatic and spectacular ways of recording fast-moving subjects. Movie Digest & iFrame movie Movie Digest captures up to 4-seconds of the action before a shot is taken, joining all the clips together from the same day into a single VGA movie to add to your collection of photos. The iFrame video format is a simple way to quickly import, edit and share video. Manual Control From semi-automatic Av and Tv modes to Full Manual the PowerShot SX220 HS gives you the choice to control one single aspect of the exposure or take complete control and be as creative as you want. Waterproof Case An optional waterproof case (WP-DC42) allows you to dive at depths down to 40m as well as protecting the camera from dust, dirt and damage.
description-en_US-mobile: PowerShot SX220 HS - 12.1MP, 1/2.3" CMOS, 4000 x 3000, DIGIC 4, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") LCD TFT, 14x Optical zoom, USB 2.0, HDMI, 215g
name: Canon PowerShot SX220 HS

name: Canon PowerShot SX220 HS

description-fr_FR-mobile: Faites de superbes photos de rés. 7 MP grâce à cet app. photo ultra-plat à boîtier métallique. Augmentez les vues d'action grâce au zoom 3x et affichez-les sur l'écran brillant 6,35 cm. Conservez le meilleur de vos photos via l'élim. des yeux rouges et le mode de stabilisation.
description-en_US-mobile: Take stunning 7 MP photos using this super-slim camera with its all-metal body. Capture more of the action with 3x zoom and review on the bright 6.35 cm display. Get the best from your shots with in-camera red-eye removal and anti-shake mode.
name: HP Photosmart R742 Digital Camera

description-fr_FR-mobile: Déclenchez, affichez et partagez vos photos 7 MP sur l'écran 7,6 cm. Obtenez le meilleur de chaque prise de vue avec le zoom optique 3x et les fonctions intégrées, telles que la suppression de l'effet « yeux rouges »[p1], retouches des yeux des animaux de compagnie, l'amincissement, les retouches photos et le mode de stabilisation HP empêchant les clichés flous.
description-en_US-print: Get superior 7 MP photos from this slim, elegant and durable camera. Get up close with the internal 3x optical zoom lens and view, edit and manage your photos via the big, bright 7.6 cm display. Make the most of every shot with in-camera features including red-eye removal[p1], pet-eye fix, slimming, HP touch-up and HP steady photo anti-shake mode. Tag favourites for emailing and in-camera slide shows, create panoramic photos and record video clips with audio. Windows Vista™ ready.
description-en_US-mobile: Shoot, view and share superior 7 MP photos via a big 7.6 cm display. Get the best from every shot with 3x optical zoom and in-camera features such as red-eye removal[p1], pet-eye fix, slimming, photo touch-up and HP steady photo anti-shake mode.
description-de_DE-print: Überragende 7-Megapixel-Fotos mit einer handlichen, eleganten und robusten Kamera. Integrierter 3x optischer Zoom für Nahaufnahmen und großes, brillantes 7,6 cm Farb-LCD zum Ansehen, Bearbeiten und Verwalten der Fotos. Stets optimale Bilder durch integrierte Kamerafunktionen wie Red-Eye Removal[p1], Pet-Eye Fix, Verschlankung, HP Fotoretusche und HP Steady Photo gegen Verwackeln. Favorisierte Fotos für den E-Mail-Versand oder Diashows auf der Kamera kennzeichnen, Panoramafotos erstellen und Videoclips mit Ton aufnehmen. Geeignet für Windows Vista™.
description-de_DE-mobile: Großes 7,6 cm Farb-LCD zum Aufnehmen, Ansehen und Präsentieren überragender 7-Megapixel-Fotos. Stets optimale Bilder durch 3x optischen Zoom und integrierte Kamerafunktionen wie Red-Eye Removal[p1], Pet-Eye Fix, Verschlankung, Fotoretusche und HP Steady Photo gegen Verwackeln.
name: HP Photosmart R837 Digital Camera

description-fr_FR-print:
nbsp;
16.1 Millions de pixels pour des souvenirs encore plus intenses.
Le Samsung ST93, ultra fin et tendance est doté d’un capteur 16.1 millions de pixels. Désormais, aucun détail ne vous échappera. Que se soit de très près ou de très loin, son grand angle 26 mm et son zoom optique 5x vous permettront d’immortaliser vos souvenirs les plus précieux.
Des images nettes à toute épreuve : Double stabilisation de l’image optique et numérique
Le moindre petit effet bougé peut gâcher votre photo. La double stabilisation de l’image (OIS + DIS) du ST93 permet de résoudre ce problème. Les images sont nettes et ce, peu importe les conditions de prise de vue. Dans une semie obscurité, que vous zoomiez ou que vos mains tremblent, vos photos bénéficieront d’une netteté et d’une clarté incomparables. Laissez votre appareil photo vous secouer… dans le bon sens du terme!
Donnez du style à vos photos!
Plus besoin de logiciel de retouche photo pour réaliser des effets originaux sur vos créations! Grâce à la fonction effets spéciaux optiques et colorimétriques, vous pouvez ajouter une touche artistique et créative à vos photos et même vos vidéos en toute simplicité. L’effet Miniature donne un effet rétréci ou « modèle réduit » à vos sujets. L’effet Vignettage ajoute un halo sombre sur les bords de l’image, l’effet Fish-eye donne une impression visuelle déformée. Quand aux effets de couleurs comme le croquis ou l’antibrouillard, ils apportent une note émotionnelle ou picturale. Maintenant, vous n’êtes qu’à un bouton de la créativité!
De la vidéo HD dans un boitier compact.
Le ST93 de Samsung combine ingénieusement des fonctionnalités performantes dans un appareil photo compact. Il vous permettra d’enregistrer des vidéos HD 720p à 30 images/seconde et son zoom X5 vous permettra de laisser libre cours à votre créativité.
Sensibilité ISO 3200
Avec un réglage ISO allant jusqu’à 3200, votre appareil Samsung vous apportera des images d’une rare netteté. Que ce soit avec une lumière très faible ou en pleine action, vos photos paraitront plus vraies que nature !
description-en_US-print: When it comes to your memories, you can never have too much detail. The Samsung ST93 digital camera comes packed with 16.1 megapixels, 26mm wide angle lens, Panorama shot and 5x Optical Zoom. So, if it is precision photography or video recording you’re after, then this is camera to have. It also boasts cool applications like Smart Filter Lens and Magic Frame, which lets you get creative with your content. Take your digital photography seriously, and capture memories that you’ll remember forever. 16.1 megapixels make memories more memorable Boasting a remarkable 16.1 megapixels, the slim, stylish ST93 delivers unforgettable photos with all the attention-grabbing details. You’ll get everyone in the shot with the 26mm wide-angle lens and get even closer to faraway subjects with the 5x optical zoom. Capture all your memories in the same high quality you come to trust from Samsung. Shake, rattle or stroll: Dual Image Stabilisation Even the tiniest shake can ruin your shot. Dual Image Stabilisation solves that. Samsung has combined the revolutionary technology of their ultimate Optical Image Stabilisation (OIS) mechanism with Digital Image Stabilisation (DIS), to give you sharp images no matter the condition. Whether it’s low light, zooming or just a case of plain old shaky hands, your photos come out sharp and clear. So let your Samsung camera shake things up. In a good way. Invent new looks for your images The ST93’s Smart Filter lens and colour options make special moods easy for still shots and even videos. The Miniature Effect gives subjects a miniaturised or model-scale look. The Vignetting Effect sets up striking compositional contrast, the Fish-eye effect enhances videos with a cool, distorted feel and colour effects, like Sketch and Defog, add an emotional or ultra-vivid vibe. Now you can get creative with just a push of a button. (Applicable filters are subject to change by shooting modes) HD quality video. Now in a compact camera The ST93 artfully combines a professional-grade still camera with a compact HD video camera. Its 720p HD quality video at 30 frames per second and 5x zoom will truly make your videos up close and personal. High Sensitivity ISO 3200 With a true ISO 3200 setting, your Samsung camera can effectively minimise noise for crystal clear images under low light conditions. Plus, ISO 3200 lets you take perfectly focused photos of fast-moving images, like during a sporting event. Create stunning photos with Magic Frame The unique Magic Frame feature allows you to create sophisticated images and poster-quality visuals that express your mood and personality. Just select one of the built-in Magic Frame templates, like Wall Art, Old Film, Full Moon, Magazine or Holiday. Point the camera at the subject you want, match it within the on-screen template and capture. In a few easy steps, your subject now is framed by a special mood and background - like magic. When it comes to brightness, it’s brilliant: 2.7’’ Intelligent LCD Its 2.7” Intelligent LCD provides improved contrast and colour reproduction, which allows you to enjoy a wider and clearer image. And its Intelligent LCD brightness automatically detects environmental illumination and adjusts the LCD brightness for optimal image viewing. It does the thinking for you, which makes the ST93 a smart choice. Take in the entire view with Panorama Shot Don’t be limited to landscapes or group portraits when taking panoramic shots with a wide-angle lens. Simply aim the camera with the shutter pressed fully down and then release when you’re ready to take the shot. Once the shots have been taken, Samsung’s proprietary panoramic technology automatically searches for motion borders of the two images and stitches them together as if a professional had taken the shot. Smart Auto 2.0 (Still & Movie) Whether it's a few friends from last night's party or the moon reflecting off the lake, Smart Auto 2.0 (Still & Movie) instantly analyses key elements of your composition then automatically adjusts to capture the perfect shot with multitude of different photo modes and movie modes.
description-en_US-mobile: ST93 - 16.1MP (4608x3456), 5x Zoom, 6.858 cm (2.7 ") TFT LCD, CCD 1/2.3", 1280x720 30fps, Micro SD / SDHC, USB 2.0, NTSC / PAL, 95g, Black
name: Samsung ST ST93

And its Intelligent LCD brightness automatically detects environmental illumination and adjusts the LCD brightness for optimal image viewing. It does the thinking for you, which makes the ST93 a smart choice. Take in the entire view with Panorama Shot Don’t be limited to landscapes or group portraits when taking panoramic shots with a wide-angle lens. Simply aim the camera with the shutter pressed fully down and then release when you’re ready to take the shot. Once the shots have been taken, Samsung’s proprietary panoramic technology automatically searches for motion borders of the two images and stitches them together as if a professional had taken the shot. Smart Auto 2.0 (Still & Movie) Whether it's a few friends from last night's party or the moon reflecting off the lake, Smart Auto 2.0 (Still & Movie) instantly analyses key elements of your composition then automatically adjusts to capture the perfect shot with multitude of different photo modes and movie modes.
description-en_US-mobile: ST93 - 16.1MP (4608x3456), 5x Zoom, 6.858 cm (2.7 ") TFT LCD, CCD 1/2.3", 1280x720 30fps, Micro SD / SDHC, USB 2.0, NTSC / PAL, 95g, Red
name: Samsung ST ST93

description-en_US-print: When it comes to your memories, you can never have too much detail. The Samsung ST93 digital camera comes packed with 16.1 megapixels, 26mm wide angle lens, Panorama shot and 5x Optical Zoom. So, if it is precision photography or video recording you’re after, then this is camera to have. It also boasts cool applications like Smart Filter Lens and Magic Frame, which lets you get creative with your content. Take your digital photography seriously, and capture memories that you’ll remember forever. 16.1 megapixels make memories more memorable Boasting a remarkable 16.1 megapixels, the slim, stylish ST93 delivers unforgettable photos with all the attention-grabbing details. You’ll get everyone in the shot with the 26mm wide-angle lens and get even closer to faraway subjects with the 5x optical zoom. Capture all your memories in the same high quality you come to trust from Samsung. Shake, rattle or stroll: Dual Image Stabilisation Even the tiniest shake can ruin your shot. Dual Image Stabilisation solves that. Samsung has combined the revolutionary technology of their ultimate Optical Image Stabilisation (OIS) mechanism with Digital Image Stabilisation (DIS), to give you sharp images no matter the condition. Whether it’s low light, zooming or just a case of plain old shaky hands, your photos come out sharp and clear. So let your Samsung camera shake things up. In a good way. Invent new looks for your images The ST93’s Smart Filter lens and colour options make special moods easy for still shots and even videos. The Miniature Effect gives subjects a miniaturised or model-scale look. The Vignetting Effect sets up striking compositional contrast, the Fish-eye effect enhances videos with a cool, distorted feel and colour effects, like Sketch and Defog, add an emotional or ultra-vivid vibe. Now you can get creative with just a push of a button. (Applicable filters are subject to change by shooting modes) HD quality video. Now in a compact camera The ST93 artfully combines a professional-grade still camera with a compact HD video camera. Its 720p HD quality video at 30 frames per second and 5x zoom will truly make your videos up close and personal. High Sensitivity ISO 3200 With a true ISO 3200 setting, your Samsung camera can effectively minimise noise for crystal clear images under low light conditions. Plus, ISO 3200 lets you take perfectly focused photos of fast-moving images, like during a sporting event. Create stunning photos with Magic Frame The unique Magic Frame feature allows you to create sophisticated images and poster-quality visuals that express your mood and personality. Just select one of the built-in Magic Frame templates, like Wall Art, Old Film, Full Moon, Magazine or Holiday. Point the camera at the subject you want, match it within the on-screen template and capture. In a few easy steps, your subject now is framed by a special mood and background - like magic. When it comes to brightness, it’s brilliant: 2.7’’ Intelligent LCD Its 2.7” Intelligent LCD provides improved contrast and colour reproduction, which allows you to enjoy a wider and clearer image. And its Intelligent LCD brightness automatically detects environmental illumination and adjusts the LCD brightness for optimal image viewing. It does the thinking for you, which makes the ST93 a smart choice. Take in the entire view with Panorama Shot Don’t be limited to landscapes or group portraits when taking panoramic shots with a wide-angle lens. Simply aim the camera with the shutter pressed fully down and then release when you’re ready to take the shot. Once the shots have been taken, Samsung’s proprietary panoramic technology automatically searches for motion borders of the two images and stitches them together as if a professional had taken the shot. Smart Auto 2.0 (Still & Movie) Whether it's a few friends from last night's party or the moon reflecting off the lake, Smart Auto 2.0 (Still & Movie) instantly analyses key elements of your composition then automatically adjusts to capture the perfect shot with multitude of different photo modes and movie modes.
description-en_US-mobile: ST93 - 16.1MP (4608x3456), 5x Zoom, 6.858 cm (2.7 ") TFT LCD, CCD 1/2.3", 1280x720 30fps, Micro SD / SDHC, USB 2.0, NTSC / PAL, 95g, Pink
name: Samsung ST ST93

description-en_US-print:
Think photos. Think digital. Think no further. 
Start me upEven though it contains a host of advanced technologies, the PowerShot A75 has been designed so first time users can switch on and start shooting for immediate, great results – straight out of the box. Yet for those that intuitively push the boundaries of their products, this 3.2 Megapixel camera comes packed with a host of features.Go furtherThe PowerShot A75 has a 3x optical zoom to close in on the action, giving photographers greater scope to get the composition just right. 13 versatile shooting modes are on board for you to experiment with – including a new 'Scene Mode' which gives access to special pre-programmed creative modes such as 'fireworks', 'foliage', 'beach' and 'snow'. The 9-point AiAF helps to ensure pictures are always perfectly focused, even when the subject is not centred.Movie modeTake up to 180 second movie clips, complete with sound recording and playback on the generous 1.8" LCD monitor. For very high definition playback on a TV, the camera can even record up to 30 second VGA clips.Behind the scenes.
-Every function on the PowerShot A75 works with you to help take great photos. Canon Visionary Technologies combine in the form of a superb quality lens, precision sensor and super fast processor to ensure accurate, high clarity image rendering. To speed up focusing and optimise exposures, the camera analyses the scene and makes setting adjustments even before the shutter release is pressed.
-Print and share from home.
A Print/Share button makes PC-less home printing to any Canon Direct Print or PictBridge compatible printer a breeze, and simplifies uploads to any Windows PC. When connected to a Canon Compact Photo Printer, the PowerShot A75 allows you to print a sequence of movie clip frames, and to produce your very own ID photos.Software .
-With Canon's ZoomBrowser EX (for Windows) and ImageBrowser (for Macintosh) you can arrange photo albums, crop photographs and adjust contrast and brightness with ease. Online sharing is simple with 100 MB free storage on CANON iMAGE GATEWAY.Optional Extras.
-An optional water-proof and shock-proof housing opens up a wide range of possibilities with protection against rain, snow, dust and water to a depth of 40m. Wide and tele converters broaden the focal range of your camera to give your images a whole new perspective. Fit the close-up lens and bring the tiny subjects of the macro world to life.
description-en_US-mobile: Powershot A75 ARTIS 3.2Mpixel - 32MBCF - 3x Optical zoom 3.2x Digital zoom - ARTIS ACTIE -
name: Canon PowerShot A75 ARTIS 3.2Mpixel - 32MBCF - 3x Optical zoom 3.2x Digital

description-fr_FR-print: W610 Appareil photo numérique compact Un appareil photo Cyber-shot™ léger, compact, et facile à utiliser 14,1 mégapixels, zoom 4 x, enregistrement vidéo, écran LCD 6,7 cm (2,7"), mode Panorama par balayage et iAUTO - Zoom optique 4x pour un grand angle de 26 mm. - Photos panoramiques réalisées en mode 360 Sweep Panorama par balayage. - Simplicité d'utilisation, même pour les débutants. Images époustouflantes en toute simplicité Léger, compact et facile à transporter, l'appareil photo numérique W610 Cyber-shot est le compagnon idéal de vos vacances, de vos réunions de famille et de toutes les autres occasions. Une qualité d'image incomparable est associée à une utilisation simple, même si vous êtes débutant en matière de photographie numérique. Elargissez votre champ de vision Les paysages spectaculaires, les photos d’architecture, les intérieurs et même les photos de famille peuvent s’avérer décevants lorsqu’ils sont tronqués sur les bords. L’objectif grand angle vous permet d’élargir votre cadre sans vous éloigner du sujet. De plus belles photos en toute facilité Vous n'êtes pas sûr d'avoir effectué les réglages optimaux sur votre appareil photo pour capturer une scène en particulier ? Nous allons vous aider. Le mode Auto intelligent (iAUTO) règle automatiquement l'exposition et les autres réglages de l'appareil photo pour des résultats optimaux dans de nombreuses. Un point de vue complet Il est désormais facile de réaliser de magnifiques photos d'un paysage ou d'une ville. Le modèle Cyber-shot superpose automatiquement des images prises en rafale ultrarapide pendant que vous décrivez un cercle de gauche à droite (ou de haut en bas !) avec l'appareil photo pour créer une image panoramique. De sublimes portraits Réalisez de magnifiques portraits de vos amis et de votre famille. La fonction Détection des visages ajuste les paramètres de l'appareil photo pour des résultats nets et clairs et des tons plus naturels. La fonction Détecteur automatique de sourires prend automatiquement la photo pour capturer ces instants. - Capteur CCD 14,1 mégapixels effectifs - Prend des photos de très grande qualité pour obtenir des agrandissements avec un haut niveau de détails. - Zoom optique 4 x / Objectif grand angle de 26 mm - Objectif zoom haute qualité pour une grande variété de prises de vue en toutes circonstances, avec un grand angle pour les photos de groupe et les paysages. - Mode Auto intelligent - L'appareil photo reconnaît de nombreuses situations courantes de prise de vue. Il optimise les paramètres afin d'obtenir des résultats clairs et nets sans difficulté. - Enregistrement vidéo - Des clips vidéo d'une netteté parfaite avec son : visionnez sur un téléviseur connecté (câble AV en option requis). - Stabilisateur SteadyShot - Le stabilisateur d'image électronique permet d'obtenir des photographies plus nettes à main levée. - Panorama par balayage 360 - Balayez l'appareil photo et saisissez des images de paysages extrêmement larges, ou de villes ou de bâtiments très élevés ; Nouveau mode 360 prend une vue panoramique. - Ecran LCD 6,7 cm / 2,7" Clear Photo - Ecran LCD haute qualité (résolution 230 000 points) au niveau de détail exceptionnel, à contraste élevé avec un grand angle de visualisation. - Reconnaissance des visages - Réglage automatique de la mise au point, de l'exposition et de la balance des blancs pour des portraits plus nets et choix de priorité enfants / adultes. - Détecteur automatique de sourires - Prend automatiquement la photo lorsque le sujet sourit, en fonction des paramètres définis et du niveau de priorité choisi pour les enfants ou les adultes. - Déclencheur pour autoportrait - Détecte le cadrage idéal lorsque l'appareil photo est tenu à bout de bras ; L'obturateur se déclenche automatiquement pour de magnifiques autoportraits. - Mode de prise vue simple - Fonctionnement simple pour les débutants avec instructions exhaustives et claires à l'écran. - Fonctionnalités de retouche intégrée - Fonctions de retouche de la photo amusantes, notamment pour la correction automatique des yeux rouges et le recadrage. - PlayMemories Home™ - Un logiciel préinstallé facilite le transfert d'images vers l'ordinateur pour la visualisation, le montage, l'impression, l'envoi par e-mail, le téléchargement à partir du web et bien plus. - Compatibilité de la carte mémoire - Cyber-shot™ accepte une large gamme de cartes, y compris Memory Stick™ et SD/SDHC - voir les spécifications techniques pour la compatibilité.
description-en_US-print: Sweep Panorama™ mode (up to 360°) Reach beyond the traditional wide angle lens, and capture more breathtaking shots with Sweep Panorama™ mode. Simply press the shutter button and sweep the camera in the desired direction and the camera continuously shoots at a high speed, then seamlessly stitches the images together with automatic position adjustment to create one stunning panoramic image. Available in wide and up to 360° full circle, the camera can take a variety of panoramic shots. Now capturing wide landscapes is as easy as press and sweep. Intelligent Auto Mode Unlike traditional auto mode, Intelligent Auto (iAuto) mode thinks for you, recognizing scenes, lighting conditions, faces, and adjusts settings resulting in clear images, faces with natural skin tone and less blur. Take advantage of all the technology without leaving Auto mode. Kids on the playground, landscape shots, a beautiful flower or an indoor birthday party; all result in clear images without leaving auto mode. Soft Skin mode Portrait subjects will love the results. Soft Skin mode recognizes skin tones and reduces the appearance of blemishes and wrinkles without affecting the rest of the shot. Self-Portrait Timer Self-Portrait Timer helps take the guesswork out of self-portraits by utilizing Face Detection technology to recognize when your face enters the frame. Once the camera detects your face, it triggers a 2-second timer, and then snaps a picture. 14.1 Megapixel Super HAD™ CCD Image Sensor A powerful 14.1 megapixel1/2.3” Super HAD™ CCD image sensor helps you capture gorgeous images with superb contrast and clarity down to the finest detail. With 14.1 megapixels, you can create stunning, photo-quality prints up to A3+ (13x19”) size, or crop your images and still come away with high resolution shots. Face Detection technology Face Detection technology detects up to eight individual faces and adjusts focus, exposure, and white balance to help deliver crisp, properly lit images of family and friends. Intelligent Scene Recognition mode Intelligent Scene Recognition (iSCN) mode automatically detects seven different types of scenes and, within just 1/30th of a second, selects the appropriate camera settings: Backlight, Backlight Portrait, Twilight, Twilight Portrait, Twilight using a tripod, Portrait, Landscape and macro. iSCN has two modes: Auto and Advanced. In Auto Mode, the camera takes a single shot using the optimal settings. In Advanced Mode, the camera takes a photo with the optimal settings and, if in difficult lighting (low light or back light) immediately takes a second photo with another optimized setting so you can choose which to keep. 2.7” (230K dots) Clear Photo™ LCD display Generous 2.7” (230K dots) Clear Photo™ LCD display features sharp, natural color that makes it easy to compose shots, read menus, and view photos, even in bright sunlight. Smile Shutter™ technology Smile Shutter™ technology captures a smile the moment it happens. Simply press the Smile Shutter™ button and the camera does the rest. You can also select adult and child priority and indicate the degree of Smile Detection sensitivity. Intelligent Scene Recognition can now be used together with Smile Shutter™ mode when the Intelligent Auto mode is on. This means that beautiful smiles can be captured with settings optimized for the particular scene, even in difficult conditions such as twilight and backlighting. Dynamic Range Optimizer Dynamic Range Optimizer (DRO) Standard and Plus uses a sophisticated algorithm to help recover shadows and highlights. The result is more natural images with clearer details that more closely match what your naked eye sees. DRO is particularly effective when shooting backlit portraits or any scene with a dramatic contrast between background and foreground lighting. DRO Plus allows for even greater optimization by analyzing each region of an image and performing additional image processing.
description-de_DE-print: W610 Digitale Kompaktkamera Leichte, kompakte und benutzerfreundliche Cyber-shot™ Kamera 14,1 Mio. Pixel, 4fach-Zoom, Filmaufnahme, 6,7-cm-LCD, Schwenkpanorama und iAUTO Dieses Produkt ist ein früheres Modell und bei Ihrem örtlichen Händler möglicherweise nicht mehr verfügbar. - 26-mm-Weitwinkelobjektiv mit optischem 4fach-Zoom. - Extrabreite Bilder dank 360°-Schwenkpanorama. - Einfache Bedienung, auch für Anfänger geeignet. Hochwertige Bilder im Handumdrehen Die leichte und kompakte Cyber-shot™ W610 Digitalkamera ist der perfekte Begleiter für Urlaub, Familientreffen und mehr. Die Kombination aus herausragender Bildqualität und einfacher Bedienung macht sie auch dann zu einer guten Wahl, wenn Sie zum ersten Mal eine Digitalkamera verwenden. Einfach mehr im Bild Aufnahmen von beeindruckenden Landschaften, Bauwerken, Innenansichten und sogar Familienfotos fallen oft enttäuschend aus, wenn an den Bildrändern etwas fehlt. Mit einem Weitwinkelobjektiv passt mehr auf Ihr Foto, ohne dass Sie sich dafür weiter vom Motiv entfernen müssen. Die ganze Bildbreite einfangen Atemberaubende Aufnahmen von Landschaften oder Stadtszenen sind kein Problem. Cyber-shot™ ermöglicht High-Speed-Serienaufnahmen bei einem Kameraschwenk (von einer Seite zur anderen oder von oben nach unten) und setzt diese dann automatisch zu einem Bild zusammen. So erzielen Sie beeindruckende Panoramaansichten. Ganz einfach schönere Bilder Sie sind sich nicht sicher, wie Sie die optimale Kameraeinstellung für eine bestimmte Szene auswählen? Hilfe ist schon zur Hand. Intelligenter Automatikmodus (iAUTO) passt die Belichtung und andere Kameraeinstellungen in verschiedenen Aufnahmesituationen automatisch an und sorgt so für optimale Ergebnisse. Schöne Porträtaufnahmen Nehmen Sie schöne Porträtfotos mit lächelnden Gesichtern von Freunden und Familie auf. Die Gesichtserkennung passt Kameraeinstellungen so an, dass klare, scharfe Bilder mit natürlichen Hauttönen entstehen. Der Smile Shutter löst automatisch aus, damit Sie glückliche Momente festhalten können. - CCD Sensor mit 14,1 Mio. Pixel (effektiv) - Äußerst hohe Bildqualität und detailgetreue Vergrößerungen. - Optischer 4-fach-Zoom, 26-mm-Weitwinkelobjektiv - Das hochwertige Zoomobjektiv deckt eine breite Palette an Aufnahmesituationen ab und bietet eine Weitwinkeleinstellung für Gruppen- oder Landschaftsaufnahmen. - Intelligenter Automatikmodus - Die Kamera erkennt zahlreiche häufige Aufnahmesituationen und optimiert die Einstellungen, sodass Sie ohne großen Aufwand herausragende Ergebnisse erhalten. - Videoaufnahme - Nehmen Sie scharfe, klare Videos mit Ton auf, und sehen Sie sie auf dem angeschlossenen Fernseher an (optionales AV-Kabel erforderlich). - SteadyShot - Elektronische Bildstabilisierung für schärfere Bilder bei handgeführten Aufnahmen. - 360°-Schwenkpanorama - Schwenken Sie die Kamera für extrabreite Landschaftsaufnahmen, Stadtansichten oder Aufnahmen hoher Gebäude; der neue 360°-Modus erstellt vollständige Rundumaufnahmen. - 6,7-cm-/2,7"-LCD mit Clear Photo Technologie - Hochwertiges LCD (230.000 Bildpunkte) für ausgezeichnete Details, hohe Kontraste und einen weiten Betrachtungswinkel. - Gesichtserkennung - Für noch schärfere Porträts stellt die Kamera Fokus, Belichtung und Weißabgleich automatisch ein und verfügt zudem über eine Prioritätenauswahl für Kinder/Erwachsene. - Smile Shutter - Löst die Aufnahme automatisch aus, wenn die Person im Sucher lächelt: mit anpassbarem Schwellenwert und wählbaren Einstellungen für Kinder und Erwachsene. - Selbstauslöser - Für richtige Bildkompositionen bei kurzem Abstand zum Motiv; ein automatischer Auslöser sorgt für perfekt in Szene gesetzte Selbstporträts. - Benutzerfreundlicher Aufnahmemodus - Gut lesbare Bildschirmanweisungen erleichtern selbst Anfängern den Umgang mit der Kamera. - Retusche direkt in der Kamera - Retuschefunktionen, einschließlich Zuschneiden und Rote-Augen-Korrektur. - PlayMemories Home - Vorinstallierte Software für eine einfache Bildübertragung auf den PC zum Ansehen, Bearbeiten, Drucken, Versenden per E-Mail, Upload ins Internet usw. - Speicherkartenkompatibilität - Cyber-shot™ unterstützt zahlreiche Speicherkarten, darunter Memory Stick™ und SD- bzw. SDHC-Karten (Angaben zur Kompatibilität siehe technische Daten).
name: Sony W610
