description-en_US-print: Super Slim Compact in Seven Colors Rich in choice with seven colors, the stylish compact body brings out the great image quality in the FinePix J series. Available in Black, Blue, Gold, Pink, Silver, Red and Purple, simply choose the one that will fit your style. Face Detection Face Detection optimizes people pictures by detecting faces and adjusting focus and exposure to ensure bright, clear results. Blink Detection The camera will warn you when people in the frame are blinking, giving you the option to retake the photo, or enlarge the face so you can save or delete the image before you take the next shot. Smile & Shoot Mode The Smile & Shoot mode of Scene Position, automatically releases the shutter when the smile appears so you won't miss the adorable smile the moment they happen. 2.7-inch Clear LCD The large, bright LCD display makes it easy to compose great photos. Sharing pictures is a pleasure, thanks to a high-impact 230,000-dot resolution.
description-en_US-mobile: FinePix JX550 - 16.0 MP, 1/2.3'' CCD, 4608 x 3440, 5x Optical zoom, 6.858 cm (2.7 ") LCD, 1280 x 720 Video, USB 1.1, NTSC/PAL, SD/SDHC/SDXC, 113g, Silver
name: Fujifilm FinePix JX550

description-en_US-print: A slim and stylish wide-angle 8x zoom camera In six unique colors, a stylish, powerful camera with the prestigious Fujinon 8x zoom lens offers High resolution images. Rich in choice with six colors, the stylish compact body brings out the great image quality in the FinePix JZ250 / JZ100. Available in Black, Silver, Pink, Blue, Red and Purple, simply choose the one that will fit your style. A high- quality Fujinon 8x zoom lens delivers picture-perfect results across the entire zoom range, from wide-angle compositions to dramatic close-up shots. An impressive 14 Megapixels resolution won't miss the finest details of your subject. Images are captured sharp and clear, in vivid colors, even when printed at large sizes. Even when it's hard to keep your camera steady, the powerful combinetion of lens-shift image stabilization and high sensitivity protects against blurring from camera shake and subject motion so you can capturethe moment. The large, bright LCD display makes it easy to compose great photos. Sharing pictures is a pleasure, thanks to a high-impact 230,000-dot resolution. Framed scenes are automatically detected and selected into appropriate camera settings: Portrait, Landscape, Night, Macro, Night Portrait, and Backlit Portrait. Face Detection optimizes people pictures by detecting faces and adjusting focus and exposure to ensure bright, clear results. Red-eye removal automatically detects and corrects flash reflection for a perfect end result. Versatile shooting modes Set specific scene-based modes suited to the subject matter you are photographing. Or experiment with advanced features, like Motion Panorama. Keeps fast moving subjects in the frame and in focus, even at 8x zoom extended. Great for capturing dynamic close-ups. Can't decide whether it's best to use flash? Choose this mode, press the shutter and automatically capture the same scene twice: once with high sensitivity and natural light, and the second time with Intelligent Flash. Later choose one or keep both! An extensive selection of pre-programmed shooting modes ensures great photos in various conditions, eliminating the need to fuss with camera settings while delivering optimum results. The versatile card slot is compatible with high-capacity Secure Digital (SDHC/SDXC) memory cards.
description-en_US-mobile: FinePix JZ100 - 1/2.3" CCD, 14.0MP, 4288x3216, 1280x720/30fps, 8x optical, TTL, 6.858 cm (2.7 ") LCD, SD/SDHC/SDXC, PictBridge, 112g, Black
name: Fujifilm FinePix JZ100

description-en_US-print: A slim and stylish wide-angle 8x zoom camera In six unique colors, a stylish, powerful camera with the prestigious Fujinon 8x zoom lens offers High resolution images. Fujinon 8x Zoom Lens & 14 Megapixels A high- quality Fujinon 8x zoom lens delivers picture-perfect results across the entire zoom range, from wide-angle compositions to dramatic close-up shots. 14 Megapixels - With Vivid Colors and Clarity An impressive 14 Megapixels resolution won't miss the finest details of your subject. Images are captured sharp and clear, in vivid colors, even when printed at large sizes. High Sensitivity ISO3200 With maximum sensitivity of ISO3200, photos appear natural and more true to life even with limited available light. High sensitivity also stops the action of high-speed moving subjects. High Sensitivity + Lens Shift Even when it's hard to keep your camera steady, the powerful combinetion of lens-shift image stabilization and high sensitivity protects against blurring from camera shake and subject motion so you can capturethe moment. 2 .7-inch Clear LCD The large, bright LCD display makes it easy to compose great photos. Sharing pictures is a pleasure, thanks to a high-impact 230,000-dot resolution. HDTV-compatible Photos & Video Able to capture both photos and movies in high-definition 16:9 format, the FinePix JZ250 / JZ100 lets you discover the impact of full-screen HDTV image display. Capture high resolution images in 16:9 format (1,280 x 720 pixels). One Touch Movie Recording Button One Touch Movie Recording Button just for shooting movies! No settings. Just press, shoot, and enjoy the movie. 6 Scene SR AUTO Framed scenes are automatically detected and selected into appropriate camera settings: Portrait, Landscape, Night, Macro, Night Portrait, and Backlit Portrait. Portrait Recognizes portraits by detecting the faces quickly in the frame and optimizing focus, brightness and white balance. Landscape Scenic shots such as mountains and buildings are automatically recognized. Colors of the sky, forests, and flower fields are captured in vivid colors and depth. Night For low-light and night-time scenarios, shutter speed and sensitivity are automatically adjusted, producing blur-free pictures with minimal noise. Macro Macro mode sets the focusing position of the details of small flowers or tiny subjects accurately. Night Portrait When photographing people at night or in low light, SR AUTO optimizes flash range, shutter speed, and exposure of the portraits, while capturing smooth and luminous background. Backlit Portrait Optimizes brightness of the faces that usually end up in shadow and underexposure caused by the light behind. Face Detection Face Detection optimizes people pictures by detecting faces and adjusting focus and exposure to ensure bright, clear results. Versatile shooting modes Set specific scene-based modes suited to the subject matter you are photographing. Or experiment with advanced features. Easy upload and searching Share pictures with friends and family, tagging pictures and movies for upload to FACEBOOK and YouTube™ right in your camera.
name: Fujifilm FinePix JZ100

name: Fujifilm FinePix JZ100

description-fr_FR-print: Objectif grand-angle de 28 mm avec zoom optique 8x Grâce au zoom optique 8x polyvalent de Canon, vous pouvez vous rapprocher des sujets distants et effectuer la mise au point sur des détails précis. L'objectif grand-angle de 28 mm vous permet quant à lui de photographier des paysages étendus ou de prendre de superbes photos de groupe. 16 millions de pixels Enregistrant tous les détails transmis par l'objectif Canon, le capteur de 16 millions de pixels fournit des images d'une qualité exceptionnelle, parfaites pour des tirages en grand format (A3 ou plus) ou pour des recadrages créatifs. Stabilisateur d'image intelligent Le stabilisateur d'image intelligent minimise les flous de bougé afin de garantir des photos et des vidéos nettes et détaillées, même au niveau de zoom maximal ou en basse lumière. Il adapte automatiquement le stabilisateur d'image optique à la scène en choisissant l'un des 6 modes disponibles afin d'éviter tout effet de flou. Grand écran LCD de 7,5 cm (3 pouces) Le grand écran LCD de haute qualité (230.000 points) assure une navigation aisée dans les menus et vous permet de cadrer et de visionner vos prises de vue en toute simplicité — partager les photos est un vrai plaisir. Boîtier en métal compact Le boîtier en métal plat et élégant, disponible dans différentes couleurs attrayantes, est suffisamment compact pour vous permettre d'emporter l'appareil photo où que vous alliez, et ce, avec style. Mode Smart Auto (32 scènes) Le mode Smart Auto détecte le type de scène et sélectionne automatiquement les paramètres les mieux adaptés parmi 32 variables. Ainsi, même les utilisateurs les moins expérimentés peuvent prendre des photos de haute qualité en toute simplicité. Et grâce à la touche Auto, une simple pression suffit à revenir au mode Smart Auto depuis n'importe quel autre mode. Vidéos HD (720p) avec touche vidéo Enregistrez instantanément des vidéos HD (720p) de haute qualité en appuyant simplement sur la touche vidéo dédiée. Et grâce au stabilisateur d'image intelligent, vous pouvez dire adieu aux vidéos tremblantes. Touche Aide La touche Aide permet d'obtenir d'une simple pression des instructions claires et rapides sur l'utilisation de l'appareil photo et ses différentes fonctions — une façon extrêmement pratique pour les débutants de se familiariser avec l'appareil. Modes amusants et créatifs Amusez-vous avec un large éventail de filtres créatifs. Utilisez le filtre Effet très grand angle pour recréer la distorsion d'un objectif « fish-eye », le filtre Super éclatant pour augmenter la saturation des couleurs, le filtre Effet poster rétro, ou encore les filtres Toy Camera ou Monochrome. Avec le filtre Effet miniature, vos photos et vos vidéos prennent l'aspect de modèles réduits. Contrôle de visée directe et détection des visages Le contrôle de visée directe vous permet d'expérimenter différents paramètres photo tels que la luminosité ou l'intensité des couleurs et de prévisualiser le résultat pendant le cadrage afin d'obtenir la prise de vue souhaitée. La technologie de détection de visages permet de réaliser de magnifiques portraits. L'appareil photo détecte jusqu'à 35 visages dans un même cadre et optimise la mise au point et la luminosité pour chacun d'entre eux. La détection de visages avec balance des blancs garantit des tons chair naturels, même dans des conditions d'éclairage inhabituelles. La correction automatique des yeux rouges éliminecet effet inesthétique des prises de vue.
description-fr_FR-mobile: PowerShot A4000 IS Silver - 16.0MP, 1/2.3-inch CCD, 4608 x 3456, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") TFT LCD, SD/SDHC/SDXC, 145g
description-en_US-print: 8x Optical Zoom with 28mm Wide-Angle Lens The 8x Optical Zoom (35mm equivalent: 28-224mm) in PowerShot A4000 IS digital camera is the most powerful ever seen in Canon's A-Series. It gives you a huge range of potential images from a single location, which is perfect for sporting events and other occasions when your shooting stance is fixed, or times when moving in too close might disrupt the action you're trying to capture. The lens's 28mm wide-angle perspective puts more image in every frame for dynamic, exciting shots. Optical Image Stabilizer Handheld shooting can often lead to camera shake, making photos and videos blurry. Canon's Optical Image Stabilizer is a sophisticated system that uses lens-shift technology to correct unwanted camera movement. 16.0 Megapixel Image Sensor with DIGIC 4 Image Processor With the camera's 16.0 Megapixels of resolution, your images are rich and clear, with textures and tiny details faithfully reproduced even at the long end of the big 8x Optical Zoom. This high level of resolution is ideal for creating the largest prints, and allows you the flexibility to blow up and crop any section of an image to express your creativity. The DIGIC 4 Image Processor powers the camera's advanced systems and features, ensuring fast, reliable performance with low battery consumption. DIGIC 4 Image Processor Canon DIGIC Image Processors have set the standard for functionality and performance since their groundbreaking introduction in 1999. With each successive generation, DIGIC processors have brought elevated performance and powerful new features to PowerShot digital cameras. The DIGIC 4 Image Processor has ushered in a new level of picture quality and accelerated processing, making possible features such as high-speed continuous shooting, HD video and Face Detection Self-timer. Smart AUTO Smart AUTO automatically detects scenes by assessing various factors in both the background and the subject. Detected scenes are analyzed using 32 predefined shooting situations. The camera then makes optimal settings to ensure the best possible image capture when shooting still images. 720p HD Video You can shoot high definition video anytime, anywhere right from the pocket-sized A4000 IS. With a simple push of the dedicated movie button, you'll be able to instantly record every moment in motion. 720p HD video is smooth, vivid, and beautifully lifelike, making it an ideal way to capture special memories. iFrame With the PowerShot A4000 IS digital camera, you can also shoot video in the Apple© iFrame format. It keeps file sizes small, making it more convenient to upload or e-mail high-quality videos. Intelligent IS The latest advance in Canon Optical Image Stabilization technology, Intelligent IS analyzes camera movement and applies the best shake correction method for the shooting situation. Help Button The PowerShot A4000 IS digital camera is designed to be fun and easy to use, even for beginners. A new Help Button on the camera's exterior brings up the help menu any time you need it, right on the LCD screen. From here, you can scroll through a variety of topics that answer your questions with clear explanations, offer helpful shooting advice, and show you diagrams highlighting the position of any buttons you'll need. Lithium-ion Battery The Canon PowerShot A4000 IS digital camera uses a rechargeable Lithium-ion battery. This compact, powerful battery helps make it a lightweight and slim camera. Charge-up is quick and easy, so the PowerShot A4000 IS will be ready and waiting for those special moments.
description-en_US-mobile: PowerShot A4000 IS Silver - 16.0MP, 1/2.3-inch CCD, 4608 x 3456, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") TFT LCD, SD/SDHC/SDXC, Silver, 145g
name: Canon PowerShot A4000

description-fr_FR-print: Zoom 8x simple d'utilisation et intelligent Passez d'un plan d'ensemble à une prise de vue rapprochée de 8× grâce au zoom optique 8× de qualité Canon, au stabilisateur d'image intelligent et au mode Smart Auto, qui garantissent des images et des vidéos HD d'une qualité exceptionnelle. Le PowerShot A4000 IS vous permet de capturer chaque instant en toute simplicité. description-fr_FR-mobile: PowerShot A4000 IS + DCC-520 + 4GB SD - 16.0 MP, 1/2.3" CCD, 4608 x 3456, TTL Autofocus, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") TFT, 15 - 1/2000 sec, SD/SDHC/SDXC, USB, NTSC/PAL, 145g
description-en_US-print: Go wide or get 8x closer with a Canon quality 8x optical zoom lens, Intelligent IS and Smart Auto for great photos and HD movies. The compact PowerShot A4000 IS captures every moment with ease. Intelligent and easy 8x zoom 28mm wide, 8x optical zoom A versatile, Canon 8x optical zoom lens lets you get closer to distant subjects and focus on the detail while the 28mm wide-angle fits more in the frame for sweeping landscapes and great group shots. 16.0 Megapixels Capturing all the detail from the genuine Canon lens the 16MP sensor delivers superb quality images that are perfect for large-scale prints (A3+) or creative cropping. Intelligent IS Intelligent IS combats camera shake to ensure all your photos and videos are sharp and detailed even at full zoom or in low light. It automatically adjusts the optical Image Stabilizer to the scene from 6 modes to prevent blur. Large 7.5 cm (3.0”) LCD A large, high quality LCD screen (230k dots) allows effortless menu navigation, lets you frame and view your shots with ease and makes sharing them with friends a pleasure. Compact metal body The slim, compact metal body in attractive colours is small and stylish enough to take anywhere. Smart Auto (32 scenes) Even complete beginners can effortlessly shoot high quality photos or movies with Smart Auto, which detects the scene and automatically selects the optimal settings from 32 variables. Press the Auto button to return instantly to Smart Auto from any other mode. HD movies (720p) with movie button Instantly record high quality HD movies (720p) using one touch of the dedicated movie button. Intelligent IS keeps movies steady. Help button Simply press the Help button for quick, easy-to-follow guidance on using your camera and its different functions – the ideal introduction for beginners. Fun and creative modes Have fun with a range of creative filters. Use Fish-eye Effect to re-create fish-eye lens distortion, Super Vivid to boost colour saturation, retro Poster and Toy Camera Effects or Monochrome. Miniature Effect makes scenes in stills or movies look like miniature scale models. Live View Control, Face Detection Live View Control allows you to easily experiment with picture settings like brightness and colour intensity and preview the results while framing, so you can capture the best shot. Face Detection Technology ensures great people shots. It detects up to 35 faces in a single frame making sure they remain in focus and with optimum brightness. Face Detection White Balance ensures natural skin tones even in unusual lighting conditions. Auto Red-Eye Correction eliminates red-eye.
description-en_US-mobile: PowerShot A4000 IS + DCC-520 + 4GB SD - 16.0 MP, 1/2.3" CCD, 4608 x 3456, TTL Autofocus, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") TFT, 15 - 1/2000 sec, SD/SDHC/SDXC, USB, NTSC/PAL, 145g
name: Canon PowerShot A4000 IS

description-en_US-print: The Ultimate EOS.\n\nCanon has brought the best of the EOS-1D Series of digital cameras into one phenomenal model: the new flagship of the EOS line, the EOS-1D X. Its full-frame 18.1 Megapixel CMOS sensor and all-new Dual DIGIC 5+ Image Processors deliver high quality image capture at up to 12 fps (14 fps in Super High Speed Mode) and a powerful ISO range of 100 - 51200 (up to 204800 in H2 mode) provides sharp, low-noise images even in the dimmest low-light conditions. An all-new, 61-Point High-Density Reticular AF and 100,000-pixel RGB Metering Sensor that uses a dedicated DIGIC 4 Image Processor, makes the EOS-1D X reach new levels of focus speed and accuracy delivering advanced tracking even for the most challenging shooting situations. Taken all together, the EOS-1D X's improved HD video capture, numerous connectivity options, combination of processing power and durable construction, including shutter durability tested to 400,000 cycles, make it the ultimate EOS.
description-en_US-mobile: Digital SLR, 18.1MP, CMOS, AF/AE, 8.128 cm (3.2 ") LCD Clear View II, CF I / II, Gigabit Ethernet, Direct Print, 61-point AF, sRGB, 2 x DIGIC 5+, Black
name: Canon EOS 1D X

description-fr_FR-print:
Avec son capteur 16 Millions de pixels et son ouverture F2.5, il vous livrera toute l'amplitude photographique dont vous avez besoin en toute circonstance. Son boitier ultra fin se glissera dans nimporte quelle poche de pantalon pour une portabilité optimale alors que son large panel d'applications créatives et amusantes vous permettront de vous amusez partout ou vous le voulez! Que vous voyagez léger ou non, il vous suivra partout!
N’ayez plus peur du noir
Ouverture lumineuse f2.5 Encore une belle soirée qui s’annonce au centre ville? L’ouverture f2.5 permet de capter plus de lumière même quand il fait nuit. Il n’a jamais été aussi facile de prendre de belles photos lors de vos soirées. Profitez pleinement d’un diner aux chandelles ou d’un coucher de soleil et capturez ces instants magiques sans sur exposer votre photo avec un flash.
Du design oui, mais surtout des photos de qualité!
16 Mp / 5x / 25 mm Avec une capacité de 16.1 Millions de pixels, le nouveau Samsung ST66 vous procure une belle qualité d’image pour les moments forts de votre vie. Son objectif grand angle 25 mm vous permettra de prendre des photos de groupe sans souci de recul et son zoom optique 5x de vous rapprocher de vos sujets.
Un résultat en direct!
Panorama en direct Avec la fonction Panorama, nul besoin de se reculer pour avoir une vision panoramique du monde. Maintenez simplement le déclencheur et balayez avec l’appareil photo ce que vous voulez capturer. Impossible de rater sa photo, le diaporama défile en direct devant vos yeux!
De la vidéo HD dans la paume de votre main!
Vidéo HD 720p Le nouveau Samsung ST66 est un concentré de style et de technologie qui a la capacité de filmer en résolution HD à 30 images / secondes (format Mpeg) qui n’est pas le cas de la plupart des appareils compact. Ne privez plus vos sorties et autres anniversaires d’une telle qualité vidéo!
Un rendu époustouflant en toutes circonstances
Reconnaissance Automatique des modes Scène 2.0 Dans n’importe quelle condition, la Reconnaissance automatique des Modes Scène 2.0 (Photo et vidéo) analyse instantanément les éléments clés de votre composition et procède ensuite à un réglage automatique pour capturer le cliché parfait avec une multitude de modes de prise de vue et de films différents (16 modes photo).
description-fr_FR-mobile: Le nouveau Samsung ST66 est l'ultime alliance entre l'extrème finesse et la performance photographique.
description-en_US-print: Product Features Clearer shots in the dark with F2.5 Bright lens Enjoying a night out on the town? The F2.5 lens captures the light to take clearer shots in the dark. Capturing moments at night have never been easier with this bright F2.5 lens. From sunsets to candle lit dinners, enjoy the moments as they are and never worry about getting dark and blurry results or disturbing those around you with the bright flash of a camera. Capture a vision that’s clearer and wider With its remarkable 16.1MP high-resolution sensor, the slim, stylish ST66 delivers your memories in vivid, sharply-detailed images. The 25mm wide-angle lens ensures you’ll get a memorable group shots, with each and every person in the frame. Also, even if you’re shooting from far away, get as close as you’d like while maintaining optimal image quality with the 5x optical zoom. See what you are going to get With Live Panorama, you can capture every peak of a sprawling mountain range or every skyscraper in a magnificent city skyline to create astounding 180º panoramic images. And you can preview the image on the LCD before you even snap it. Just hold the shutter button, sweep across the scene and see what you’re going to get before you get it.
name: Samsung ST 66

description-en_US-print: EOS 5D Mark III is generated by a full-frame 22.3-megapixel CMOS sensor that can shoot up to 6 frames per second (fps). Powered by Canon's state-of-the-art DIGIC 5+ image processor, the EOS 5D MARK III is capable of incredible ISO speeds of up to 25600 (expandable to 102400). A newly expanded 61-point Auto-Focus (AF) system makes it easier to track subjects with higher levels of precision and speeds. 22.3-megapixel sensor High resolution 22.3-megapixel images of superb quality and detail are attained from Canon's cutting-edge full-frame CMOS sensor technology. New photodiode construction, gapless microlens array and on-chip noise reduction circuitry on the CMOS keep image data clean and clear even at high ISO settings and long exposures, so your photographic vision is never compromised. 61-point high-density reticular AF The EOS 5D Mark III features a next-generation Auto Focus (AF) system sporting 61 point high-density reticular AF (41 cross-type points) that offers wide, auto focus coverage at high precision as well as enhanced subject tracking capability. It offers multi-zone wide-area AF for better tracking, has 5 central dual cross-type points (f/2.8 diagonal), 21 central cross-type points (f/5.6 horizontal & vertical) and 20 outer cross-type points (f/4.0 horizontal) and is sensitive in extremely low-light situations (EV-2 for a central point with a f/2.8 lens). The technological advancement in the EOS 5D Mark III dramatically expands focusing accuracy to support a larger range of f/4.0 and f/5.6 lenses. ISO expandable to 102400 No matter your exposure requirements, the EOS 5D Mark III allows flexible ISO speed settings of ISO 100 – 25600 and expandable to L: ISO50, H1: 51200 and H2: 102400 to adjust the camera's sensitivity to light. From low light indoor environments to the great outdoors in broad daylight, the EOS 5D Mark III captures every picture in the best possible light.
description-en_US-mobile: EOS 5D Mark III - 22.3MP, 36 x 24mm CMOS, 5760 x 3840, Full HD, 8.128 cm (3.2 ") TFT, SD/SDHC/SDXC, mini HDMI, USB 2.0, Black
name: Canon EOS 5D Mark III

name: Canon EOS 5D Mark III + EF 24-105 F4L IS USM

description-fr_FR-print: Jusqu’à aujourd’hui, les photographes devaient choisir entre des appareils photo performants et simples d’utilisation. Le Samsung NX200 vous évite ce choix et réveille le photographe qui sommeille en vous. Grâce à son nouveau capteur APS-C CMOS 20.3 Millions de pixels, les images de votre NX200 raviront même les amateurs de photo les plus exigeants ! Les fonctionnalités innovantes du NX200, alliées à son design ergonomique en font un bijou de performance et de simplicité. Samsung a conçu son nouveau capteur APS-C CMOS 20.3 Millions de pixels pour s’intégrer parfaitement au Samsung NX200, appareil photo hybride à objectifs interchangeables, sans miroir interne, composant encombrant caractéristique du réflex. Le capteur haut de gamme de cet appareil lui assure plus de lumière par pixel ce qui rend vos images plus éclatantes et colorées. Ce nouveau capteur permet aussi de faire des vidéos en qualité Full HD pour une définition et une clarté d’image inégalée. Un appareil photo qui a la gâchette facile! Saisir un instant de bonheur est une question de rapidité. Les capacités du Samsung NX200 vous permettent de photographier facilement des sujets en mouvements rapides. Le tout-nouveau algorithme de l’autofocus permet une mise au point précise et instantanée. Avec une vitesse allant jusqu’à 7 photos par seconde, vous ne risquez pas de rater le cliché idéal !
description-fr_FR-mobile: 20.3MP, APS-C CMOS, 5472 x 3648 px, RAW, Exif 2.21, DCF, DPOF 1.1, OIS, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") AMOLED, 640 x 480 px, 614000 px, 1/4000 - 30 s, ISO12800, NTSC, PAL, MP4, H.264, 1920 x 1080 px, SD, SDHC, SDXC, PictBridge, USB 2.0, HDMI, 220.4 g
description-en_US-print: Until now, photographers have had to choose between the highest performance levels and ease of use. Samsung’s long-anticipated NX200 renders that decision obsolete, unleashing the professional photographer inside us all. Thanks to a 20.3 megapixels APS-C CMOS Sensor, the NX200 delivers images that will satisfy even the most discerning eye. Just as importantly, the camera’s innovative features and design make those images easier than ever to capture. Reality never looked so real 20.3MP APS-C CMOS Sensor Samsung has customised the new, 20.3 megapixels APS-C CMOS Sensor to perfectly complement the mirrorless lens system of the Samsung NX200, a feature typically found only in DSLRs. The professional-grade sensor ensures that each individual pixel receives more light. The resulting images are amazingly true to life, with rich, brilliant colours. The sensor also captures Full HD video that maintains higher definition and clarity than ever before. A camera that’s quick on the draw. High Speed Capture (7fps) and ultra fast AutoFocus (100ms). Picture perfect moments don’t last long enough. The Samsung NX200’s High Speed Capture capabilities enable you to capture fast moving objects at a sequential rate of 7fps at full resolution, allowing you to capture every movement in incredible detail. An all-new autofocus algorithm, delivers accurate, instantaneous (100ms) autofocus allowing to capture every memory however quickly it happens. See more in lower light Wide range ISO (100 ~ 12800) The right exposure can make the difference between a stunning photo and a forgettable one. But some lighting conditions call for greater sensitivity than most cameras allow. The NX200 lets you shoot as high as 12800 ISO at normal settings. Even in low light, you can take high-speed photos with minimal noise or blurring. When needed, the range can be expanded further so you can maximise the potential of any light available, capturing natural-looking images even indoors or at night. Discover the true beauty of Full HD video 1080 30p Full HD Movie (H.264) The NX200’s uncompromising performance isn’t limited to still images. The camera’s 1080 30p Full HD recording capabilities let you create professional-looking videos, and the built-in stereo mic make them sound professional too. An 18 - 200mm lens exclusively for Full HD video produces smooth, dynamic movies with wide zoom capability. When you’re ready for showtime, an HDMI interface lets you transmit your vision straight to the big screen. Picture performance that meets its design The sleekly designed NX200 puts the power of a professional-grade camera in the palm of your hand. Every function was designed for easy access and instinctive use. Packing a genuine DSLR-sized sensor and interchangeable lens system into a lightweight, compact body, the NX200 is the ultimate high-performance camera you can carry in your pocket. Take full control of your pictures i-Function 2.0 The NX200 makes it easy to create spectacular images on the move. Samsung’s unique i-function technology allows you to manually control image capture settings by touching the i-function button on the lens and change the values within this settings with the lens value ring. This allows you to adjust your photo without having to take your eye off the subject and ensure that you capture the perfect shot every time. Updated i-function 2.0 also allows you to customise which settings you can control via the i-function button, so you can make the camera work perfectly with your photography style. Bring the magic back into your photos and videos Magic mode (Smart Filter + Magic Frame) The NX200’s Magic Mode gives you control over special moods and effects that expand your creative palette. Your choice of 10 types of Smart Filters and 12 types of Magic Frames help you create poster-quality visuals without all the work. New special effects include Soft Focus for a warm ambience and Half-Tone Dot for a comic-book look. 3” VGA AMOLED Display The NX200’s thin and light 3” VGA AMOLED display provides darker blacks and more vibrant colours than a conventional TFT-LCD display, even in direct sunlight. It also responds 3000 times faster, so your images appear almost as quickly as you shoot them, freeing you to move on to the next shot. Panorama, 3D Panorama, Action Panorama The NX200’s panoramic capabilities let you capture vast landscapes and dramatic vertical shots at the touch of a button. 3D panorama makes these shots even more impressive by making certain elements jump out of the photo. Action panorama, unique to Samsung, allows you to also capture movement along a sweeping panorama. The background will remain a seamless panoramic shot but will capture the moving object at several stages along its journey, ideal for capturing your child’s race at their first sports day. DRIMIII DSP (Digital Signal Processor) One key to the NX200’s stunning images and Full HD video is its advanced image processor. Supporting a sensitivity range of ISO 100 - 12800, DRIM DSP instantly recognises and reduces noise and distortion. That means you don’t need perfect circumstances to get perfect results. Smart Panel Advanced capabilities don’t mean much if you can’t find them. The NX200’s user-friendly Smart Panel puts all the most important controls at your fingertips. Accessible by hot key, the intuitive graphical interface ensures that you won’t miss a great shot while you’re fiddling with settings. There is also a hot key to take you directly to movie recording at the touch of a button.
description-en_US-mobile: 20.3MP, APS-C CMOS, 5472 x 3648 px, RAW, Exif 2.21, DCF, DPOF 1.1, OIS, 7.62 cm (3.0 ") AMOLED, 640 x 480 px, 614000 px, 1/4000 - 30 s, ISO12800, NTSC, PAL, MP4, H.264, 1920 x 1080 px, SD, SDHC, SDXC, PictBridge, USB 2.0, HDMI, 220.4 g, Black
name: Samsung NX 200

description-en_US-print: Full-frame 22.3-megapixel sensor Capture high-quality images that are full of detail with a 22.3 megapixel CMOS sensor and DIGIC 5+ image processor. Colours are bright but natural, and fine detail is preserved even in dark shadow areas and bright highlights. High-quality performance, even in low light The EOS 5D Mark III delivers superb picture quality whatever the lighting conditions. Keep shooting hand-held even after the sun goes down, thanks to an ISO 100–25,600 sensitivity range (extendable to ISO 102,400). 61-point wide-area autofocus Focus quickly and accurately, even on off-centre subjects, with a 61 point wide-area autofocus system. 41 cross-type points (five of which are extra sensitive double-cross type) ensure highly accurate tracking of moving objects. High-speed continuous shooting Keep up with the action at 6fps, recording up to 16,270 continuous JPEG images to a UDMA mode 7 card in a single burst. High dynamic range imaging Preserve detail in highlight and shadow areas with in-camera HDR image creation. Full-HD video with manual control Enjoy high quality Full HD video at 1080p resolution. Use manual controls and Canon’s comprehensive EF lens range to achieve cinematic visual effects. Great quality sound Give your video footage the soundtrack it deserves. The EOS 5D Mark III records digital stereo sound at 48KHz and offers manual control over audio level. A standard 3.5mm mic socket enables the use of third-party microphones; a headphone socket permits audio monitoring while recording. In-camera editing functions Begin your digital editing workflow before you arrive back home. Rate your images on a scale of one to five and compare two images simultaneously on screen. Use in-camera Raw processing to explore creative possibilities – such as black & white conversion and retrospective white balance. Built to go anywhere A magnesium chassis provides strength and durability without adding weight. Weather sealing offers protection against dust and moisture.

Quality + Speed for Amazing Captures With the S2980’s improved start-up and auto focus response, you always capture the image you want with amazing colour and clarity. High Performance Shooting Functions The high-performance shooting functions of the S2980 give you total versatility and the optimum setting for any scene. HD Quality Movies & Photos Shoot and share in HD quality then edit them in your camera. Capture Full HD still photos or HD videos in 720p that you can display in 16x9 full screen glory. Face Detection for Perfect Portraits The S2980’s Face Detection functions make it easy to shoot perfect portraits and group shots without red eyes and blinking. You don’t even have to wait for your subject to say “cheese” with the Smile & Shoot mode. Easy Upload and Searching Tag your pictures and movies for upload to FACEBOOK and YouTube™ right in your camera so you can easily share pictures with friends and family.

description-en_US-print: The FinePix JV300 is the perfect match for any newcomers to photography. With a 14 megapixel resolution sensor, a 3x Fujinon optical zoom lens, a 2.7inch LCD screen and a whole host of easy-to-use features, this digital camera is raring to go! Features such as Scene Recognition Auto, Digital Image Stabilisation, Smile and Shoot mode and Motion Panorama, are guaranteed to keep beginner photographers on their toes! What's more with 6 vibrant colours to choose from, the FinePix JV300 from Fujifilm, will be sure to look the part!
description-en_US-mobile: FinePix JV300 - 14.0MP, 4288 x 3216, 1/2.3" CCD, 3x Optical zoom, 6.858 cm (2.7 ") TFT LCD, SD/SDHC, USB 2.0, NTSC/PAL, 120g
name: Fujifilm FinePix JV300

description-en_US-print: A slim and stylish wide-angle 8x zoom camera In six unique colors, a stylish, powerful camera with the prestigious Fujinon 8x zoom lens offers High resolution images. Rich in choice with six colors, the stylish compact body brings out the great image quality in the FinePix JZ250 / JZ100. Available in Black, Silver, Pink, Blue, Red and Purple, simply choose the one that will fit your style. A high- quality Fujinon 8x zoom lens delivers picture-perfect results across the entire zoom range, from wide-angle compositions to dramatic close-up shots. An impressive 14 Megapixels resolution won't miss the finest details of your subject. Images are captured sharp and clear, in vivid colors, even when printed at large sizes. Even when it's hard to keep your camera steady, the powerful combinetion of lens-shift image stabilization and high sensitivity protects against blurring from camera shake and subject motion so you can capturethe moment. The large, bright LCD display makes it easy to compose great photos. Sharing pictures is a pleasure, thanks to a high-impact 230,000-dot resolution. Framed scenes are automatically detected and selected into appropriate camera settings: Portrait, Landscape, Night, Macro, Night Portrait, and Backlit Portrait. Face Detection optimizes people pictures by detecting faces and adjusting focus and exposure to ensure bright, clear results. Red-eye removal automatically detects and corrects flash reflection for a perfect end result. Versatile shooting modes Set specific scene-based modes suited to the subject matter you are photographing. Or experiment with advanced features, like Motion Panorama. Keeps fast moving subjects in the frame and in focus, even at 8x zoom extended. Great for capturing dynamic close-ups. Can't decide whether it's best to use flash? Choose this mode, press the shutter and automatically capture the same scene twice: once with high sensitivity and natural light, and the second time with Intelligent Flash. Later choose one or keep both! An extensive selection of pre-programmed shooting modes ensures great photos in various conditions, eliminating the need to fuss with camera settings while delivering optimum results. The versatile card slot is compatible with high-capacity Secure Digital (SDHC/SDXC) memory cards.
description-en_US-mobile: FinePix JZ100 - 14.0MP, 4288 x 3216, 1/2.3" CCD, 8x Optical zoom, 6.858 cm (2.7 ") TFT LCD, SD/SDHC/SDXC, USB 2.0, NTSC/PAL, 129g

More Fun Waiting. Even After Shooting Share pictures with friends and family, tagging pictures and movies for upload to FACEBOOK™ and YouTube™ right in your camera.

description-en_US-print: - More sensitivity to IR light. - 18-megapixel APS-C CMOS sensor. - Vari-angle 7.7cm (3.0”) 3:2 Clear View LCD screen. - ISO 100-6400, expandable to ISO 12,800. - Time-lapse shooting with EOS Utility software or optional TC-80N3. - Aimed at astrophotographers seeking extra IR sensitivity for specialist applications. Sensitivity to long-wavelength light Based on the popular EOS 60D camera, the EOS 60Da features enhanced sensitivity to H-a long-wavelength light, making it ideal for applications in astronomy. A modified low-pass optical filter improves recording of infrared phenomena, such as diffuse nebulae, by approximately three times compared to EOS 60D. High Resolution Capture high-resolution photographs that are full of detail. An 18-megapixel CMOS sensor works with a 14-bit DIGIC 4 image processor to deliver images that are low in noise, even when shooting with long exposures or at high ISO sensitivity (max ISO 6400, expandable to ISO 12,800). Vari-angle LCD Compose, focus and shoot from any angle with a Vari-angle 7.7cm (3.0”) 3:2 Clear View LCD screen, even with the camera attached to a telescope. Time lapse shooting For time-lapse shooting, the EOS 60Da is compatible with the optional TC-80N3 remote control (using the supplied RA-E3 adaptor). Remote camera control and tethered shooting is possible from any PC or Mac computer using the supplied EOS Utility software.
description-en_US-mobile: EOS 60Da, 18MP, 3:2, 22.3 x 14.9 CMOS, 5184 x 3456, 12800 ISO, 7.62 cm (3 ") LCD, Full HD, Black
description-de_DE-print: - Höhere Empfindlichkeit bei Infrarotlicht - APS-C CMOS-Sensor mit 18 Megapixel - Dreh- und schwenkbares 7,7 cm (3,0 Zoll) großes Clear View-LCD, Seitenverhältnis 3:2 - ISO 100-6.400, erweiterbar auf ISO 12.800 - Zeitrafferaufnahmen mit der Software EOS Utility oder der optionalen Fernbedienung TC-80N3. - Speziell für Astrofotografen geeignet, die für Spezialanwendungen eine erhöhte Infrarot-Empfindlichkeit benötigen. Empfindlichkeit für langwelliges Licht Die EOS 60Da, die auf Grundlage der beliebten EOS 60D konstruiert wurde, nimmt auch das langwellige Hα-Licht auf und eignet sich somit ideal für alle Anwendungen in der Astronomie. Im Vergleich zur EOS 60D verbessert der modifizierte optische Tiefpassfilter die Aufnahme von Infrarotlicht ungefähr um den Faktor Drei und ermöglicht so das Fotografieren von Infrarotphänomenen wie beispielsweise diffusem Nebel. Hohe Auflösung Hochauflösende Fotos voller Details. Der 18 MP CMOS-Sensor in Verbindung mit einem 14 Bit DIGIC 4 Bildprozessor liefert rauscharme Aufnahmen – selbst bei langer Belichtung oder bei hoher ISO-Einstellung (max. ISO 6.400, erweiterbar auf bis zu ISO 12.800). Dreh- und schwenkbares LCD Mit dem dreh- und schwenkbaren 7,7 cm (3,0 Zoll) Clear View LC-Display gelingen Bildkomposition, Scharfstellung und Einstellungen aus praktisch jedem Blickwinkel, selbst wenn die Kamera an einem Teleskop angebracht ist. Zeitrafferaufnahmen Für Zeitraffer-Aufnahmen ist die EOS 60Da mit der optional erhältlichen Fernbedienung TC-80N3 kompatibel (im Lieferumfang befindlicher Adapter RA-E3 erforderlich). Mit der Software EOS Utility sind Kamerafernbedienung oder Tethered Shooting (kabelgebundene Ansteuerung) von jedem PC oder Mac Computer möglich.
description-de_DE-mobile: EOS 60Da, 18MP, 3:2, 22.3 x 14.9 CMOS, 5184 x 3456, 12800 ISO, 7.62 cm (3 ") LCD, Full HD, Schwarz
name: Canon EOS 60Da

description-en_US-print: The Power to Create. Canon is proud to present the highly anticipated EOS 5D Mark III. With supercharged EOS performance and stunning full frame, high-resolution image capture, the EOS 5D Mark III is designed to perform. Special optical technologies like the 61-Point High Density Reticular AF and an extended ISO range of 100-25600 (expandable to 50 (L), 51200 (H1) and 102400 (H2) make the EOS 5D Mark III ideal for shooting weddings in the studio or out in the field, and great for still photography. Advanced professional-level high definition video capabilities (that includes a host of industry-standard recording protocols and enhanced performance) make it possible to capture beautiful cinematic movies in EOS HD quality. A newly designed 22.3 Megapixel full-frame Canon CMOS sensor, Canon DIGIC 5+ Image Processor, and shooting performance up to 6.0 fps provide exceptional clarity and sharpness, even when capturing rapidly-unfolding scenes. Additional technological advancements include an Intelligent Viewfinder, Canon's advanced iFCL metering system, High Dynamic Range (HDR), and Multiple Exposure mode — all of which that help make the EOS 5D Mark III the perfect multimedia tool. 22.3 Megapixel full-frame CMOS sensor The EOS 5D Mark III features a newly developed Canon full-frame 22.3 Megapixel CMOS sensor that?s designed from the ground up to create high resolution, perfectly detailed images with unprecedented speed and clarity. A full 24 x 36mm, the sensor captures 5784 x 3861 large individual 6.25 µm pixels and has a much-improved S/N ratio resulting in better images from the start. A new photodiode structure with an increased photoelectric conversion rate increases the sensor's sensitivity by approximately 2 stops over previous models, meaning higher ISOs with the lowest noise of any EOS digital camera. And a 2-line 8-channel simultaneous signal readout means speeds of up to 6.0 fps (RAW + JPEG) are possible! 14-bit A/D conversion, wide range ISO setting 100-25600 (L: 50, H1: 51200, H2: 102400) The EOS 5D Mark III not only offers 14-bit signal processing for excellent image gradation, it delivers higher standard and expanded ISOs, and a score of new options to enhance shooting in varied and fast-changing lighting situations. With a standard range of ISO 100-25600, the EOS 5D Mark III represents a 2-stop increase in sensitivity over previous cameras. Thanks to the improved signal-to-noise ratio of the new sensor and powerful noise reduction, the EOS 5D Mark III can shoot at expanded sensitivities down to ISO 50 (L) and up to 51200 (H1), and even 102400 (H2)! Beyond the obvious advantages of its wide ISO range, the EOS 5D Mark III has automatic ISO settings, found on the dedicated ISO menu. Minimum and maximum ISO settings can be specified, as can a user-defined range, plus full auto and manual. DIGIC 5+ Image Processor for enhanced noise reduction and blazing processing speed For a whole new level of performance, the EOS 5D Mark III uses a DIGIC 5+ Image Processor. Working with two 4-channel A/D converter front-end processing circuits, and delivering speeds of up to 6.0 fps (RAW + JPEG), and the DIGIC 5+ Image Processor improves data processing performance and features new algorithms that promote greater noise reduction at higher ISOs. In addition to conventional image processing functions the DIGIC 5+ Image Processor offers real-time compensation for chromatic aberration in both still and motion images. With the power of this processor, speed improvements are noticeable from the instant the camera is turned on and the stunning results speak for themselves.
name: Canon EOS 5D Mark III + EF 24-105

description-fr_FR-print:
nbsp;
Des clichés plus clairs, même dans l’obscurité
Il vous arrive de passer une nuit en ville ? L’objectif F2,5 capture la lumière pour prendre des clichés plus clairs dans l’obscurité. Il n’a jamais été aussi facile de capturer des moments pendant la nuit grâce à l’objectif lumineux F2,5. Qu’il s’agisse d’un coucher de soleil ou d’un dîner aux chandelles, profitez du moment où que vous soyez et ne vous souciez plus d’obtenir des résultats sombres ou flous, ni de perturber les personnes autour de vous avec le flash lumineux de l’appareil photo.
Capturez une vision plus claire et plus large.
Grâce à son remarquable capteur haute résolution de 16,1 mégapixels, le ST76 compact et élégant capture vos souvenirs sur des images éclatantes et aux détails précis. L’objectif grand angle de 25 mm vous garantit des photos de groupe mémorables sur lesquelles chaque personne figurera dans le cadre. En outre, même si vous prenez des clichés à distance, vous pouvez vous rapprocher de votre sujet comme vous le souhaitez tout en conservant une qualité d'image optimale grâce au zoom optique 5x.
Affichez votre résultat.
Grâce à Live Panorama, vous pouvez capturer chaque sommet d’une immense chaîne de montagnes ou chaque gratte-ciel d’un magnifique paysage urbain afin de créer des images panoramiques époustouflantes à 180°. De même, vous pouvez avoir un aperçu de l'image sur l'écran LCD avant même de la capturer. Il suffit de maintenir le déclencheur enfoncé et de balayer la scène pour voir le résultat avant de le capturer.
Des films HD au creux de votre paume.
Cet appareil photo élégant mais puissant capture des vidéos MJPEG 720p de qualité HD à 30 images par seconde, soit un résultat plus clair qu’une caméra vidéo numérique compact moyenne.
Vous obtiendrez ainsi des vidéos de qualité HD où que vous soyez, dans une salle de concert ou dans une fête d’anniversaire.
Le chemin le plus simple vers le professionnalisme.
Lorsque vous prenez des clichés dans des conditions lumineuses et que vous ne parvenez pas à voir le visage de votre sujet, utilisez le mode Backlight pour obtenir une image plus claire grâce à Smart Auto 2.0 (Photo et vidéo). Vous obtiendrez toujours le meilleur résultat possible. La technologie de détection de scène est capable d’identifier jusqu’à 16 conditions de prise de vue différentes, d’analyser instantanément les éléments clés de votre composition et de se régler automatiquement pour optimiser les paramètres pour chaque situation particulière.
description-en_US-print: Samsung SAMSUNG ST76
description-en_US-mobile: Samsung SAMSUNG ST76
name: Samsung ST76

description-fr_FR-print:
- Capteur CCD 10,2 mégapixels effectifs et processeur BIONZ optimisé pour une qualité d'image optimale, un bruit réduit et un fonctionnement dynamique
- Haute sensibilité jusqu'à ISO3200 avec réduction du bruit High ISO pour des photos réussies sans flash en condition de faible luminosité, même sans trépied
- Optimisateur de gamme D pour régler la luminosité et le contraste pour de magnifiques photos en contre-jour
- Le stabilisateur SteadyShot intégré avancé offre une grande stabilité (pas 2,5 - 3,5) avec tous les objectifs à monture de type α*
- Grand écran 2,7" « Clear Photo LCD » facile d'utilisation et témoin d'usure de la batterie
- Mise au point automatique centrée 9 points améliorée avec activation EyeStart pour une mise au point rapide et précise
- Prise de vue continue à 3 ips (mode Fine JPEG, limité par la capacité de la carte mémoire)
- La batterie InfoLITHIUM haute capacité permet de prendre jusqu'à 750 photos entre deux charges (norme CIPA)
- Le double système anti-poussière protège le capteur lors des changements d'objectif
- *SteadyShot intégré était auparavant connu sous le nom Super SteadyShot.
description-en_US-print: Enter the exciting world of DSLR photography with the highly capable α (alpha) DSLR-A200 camera and the included 18-70mm zoom lens. With total creative control over your shots, you'll have frame-worthy results in no time.
description-de_DE-print:
- CCD-Sensor mit effektiv 10,2 Mio. Pixel und optimierter BIONZ Prozessor für mehr Bildqualität, weniger Bildrauschen und schnelle Reaktionen
- Die hohe Empfindlichkeit bis zu ISO3200 und die Rauschunterdrückung für hohe ISO-Werte erlauben auch bei schlechten Lichtverhältnissen handgehaltene Aufnahmen ohne Blitz.
- Die dynamische Bereichsoptimierung passt Belichtung und Kontrast an, um bei Szenen mit Hintergrundbeleuchtung eine optimale Belichtungseinstellung zu erreichen.
- Die verbesserte SteadyShot INSIDE-Bildstabilisierung bietet eine Anti-Shake-Funktion mit 2,5-3,5 Schritten für alle α-Objektive.*
- 2,7" großes Clear Photo LC-Display mit benutzerfreundlichen Funktionsanzeigen und Ladezustandsanzeige
- Verbesserter 9-Punkte-Autofokus mit Fadenkreuz mit EyeStart-Aktivierung zur schnellen und präzisen Fokussierung
- 3 Serienbilder pro Sekunde (JPEG Fine-Modus, Einschränkung je nach Speicherkartenkapazität)
- Der InfoLITHIUM-Akku mit hoher Kapazität erlaubt zwischen den Ladezyklen bis zu 750 Aufnahmen (CIPA-Messung)
- Ein zweifaches Anti-Staubsystem schützt den Sensor beim Austauschen des Objektivs
- *„SteadyShot INSIDE“ war zuvor unter der Bezeichnung „Super SteadyShot“ bekannt.
name: Sony DSLR-A200 + 18-70mm + 75-300mm

description-en_US-print: The Premium Travel Zoom - All You Dreamed of and More! 20x optical zoom performance plus Intelligent Digital Zoom for extreme 40x telephoto shots - all in the smallest long-zoom compact in the world.* Every control is at your fingertips. - NEW FUJINON 20x Optical Zoom Lens Plus 40x Intelligent Digital Zoom - Image Stabilization (CMOS Shift + High ISO) - Faster So Your Never Miss a Moment - High Speed Shooting Functions - Intuitive Control Palette - 3.0-inch LCD with NEW “Monitor Sunlight Mode” - FUJINON Lens Technology High Quality Photos & Movies with the New EXR AUTO The EXR CMOS sensor for breathtaking image quality in low-light scenes, and the EXR Processor for lightning-fast auto focus. - NEW EXR AUTO 103 Shooting Patterns with Motion Detection - New Face Tracking AF - Super High Quality Full HD Movies - RP (Real Photo) Technology More Creative Photography for You With Individual Shutter 3D Shooting, you can make two shots of the same subjects from different positions. description-en_US-print: Rugged Design For The Great Outdoors! Built to withstand whatever you throw at it. The XP150 is waterproof to 10m, shock proof to 2m, sealed against dust and sand, and even works in temperatures down to -10°C. Superb Quality Photos and Movies This high functional compact body incorporates the award-winning Fujinon Lens of 5x zoom, 14 megapixels and image stability. Frame, shoot, zoom... great photos and videos are easy! The Camera Knows Where you are! Capture images and reflect back to your unforgettable trips. With the GPS, searching for images, classifying and creating your own Photobook can be done easily. You can even plot your route on the map with MyFinePix Studio! Fun & Flexible Shooting Modes Fun and easy ways to enjoy capturing photos and movies from land to underwater. Also offering various shooting modes suitable for any scene. Editing, Uploading and Sharing for Everyone Sharing your favorite pictures and videos online cannot be made any simpler - just shoot, edit, select, and upload.
name: Fujifilm FinePix XP150

description-en_US-print: ACB(Auto Contrast Balance) function The new Auto Contrast Balance automatically compensates the brightness of objects in challenging light environments (ie back lit conditions) to ensure a perfectly exposed image. 8.1 mega pixel Schneider Kreuznach lens As part of the second generation of the NV series, the Samsung NV8 is equipped with an 8.1 mega pixel CCD. Fast ASR (Advanced Shake Reduction) function Fast ASR technology prevents the degradation of image clarity and colour which is sometimes found in flash photography. With Fast ASR the effects of image blur are reduced in lower light conditions. You can even take well exposed, sharper pictures in low light conditions without using a flash at all, which guarantees brighter and more natural pictures. The superior Schneider-KREUZNACH lens The high-quality optics in Schneider-KREUZNACH lenses deliver crystal-clear images with every shot. The bright F2.8 lens offers even resolution from the centre to the edges. For more natural-looking pictures, each lens surface is multi-coated to minimise the "ghost" or "flare" phenomenon. Innovative User Interface "Smart Touch" Navigating complicated menu systems is a thing of the past! The brilliant Smart Touch user interface makes accessing menu functions and reviewing your images an absolute pleasure. This unique touch-ensitive system gives you easy, intuitive control over the camera, and the large 2.5" LCD gives you a great view every time. Consistent NV Design The new Samsung NV series includes all the iconic features of the NV range including a stable grip for the reduction of camera shake, a pop-up flash, the NV blue ring and unique state of the art Smart Touch interface.
description-en_US-mobile: NV8 Silver - 8.1Megapixel, 3264 x 2448

description-en_US-print: Designed specifically for astrophotography, the EOS 60Da is more sensitive to infrared light thanks to a modified low-pass filter that sits in front of the camera’s 18-megapixel CMOS sensor. - More sensitivity to IR light. - 18-megapixel APS-C CMOS sensor. - Vari-angle 7.7cm (3.0”) 3:2 Clear View LCD screen. - ISO 100-6400, expandable to ISO 12,800. - Time-lapse shooting with EOS Utility software or optional TC-80N3. - Aimed at astrophotographers seeking extra IR sensitivity for specialist applications. Sensitivity to long-wavelength light Based on the popular EOS 60D camera, the EOS 60Da features enhanced sensitivity to H-a long-wavelength light, making it ideal for applications in astronomy. A modified low-pass optical filter improves recording of infrared phenomena, such as diffuse nebulae, by approximately three times compared to EOS 60D. High Resolution Capture high-resolution photographs that are full of detail. An 18-megapixel CMOS sensor works with a 14-bit DIGIC 4 image processor to deliver images that are low in noise, even when shooting with long exposures or at high ISO sensitivity (max ISO 6400, expandable to ISO 12,800). Vari-angle LCD Compose, focus and shoot from any angle with a Vari-angle 7.7cm (3.0”) 3:2 Clear View LCD screen, even with the camera attached to a telescope. Time lapse shooting For time-lapse shooting, the EOS 60Da is compatible with the optional TC-80N3 remote control (using the supplied RA-E3 adaptor). Remote camera control and tethered shooting is possible from any PC or Mac computer using the supplied EOS Utility software.
description-en_US-mobile: EOS 60Da, 7.62 cm (3 ") LCD, 3:2, 18MP, 22.3 x 14.9 CMOS, 5184 x 3456, ISO 100 - 6400, Full HD, Black
name: Canon EOS 60Da

description-en_US-print: Combining a large 14.3 MP Canon CMOS sensor, DIGIC 5 processor and exceptional 4x zoom lens the PowerShot G1 X gives you SLR-levels of control and image quality in a compact camera body. Large 14.3 MP Canon CMOS, DIGIC 5, HS System The large CMOS sensor at 18.7 x 14.0 mm (4:3) has a similar height to a Canon DSLR APS-C sensor. When combined with the DIGIC 5 image processor it produces stunning DSLR-like image quality with high ISO up to 12800 for exceptional images even in the darkest of conditions. The large sensor also allows photographers to shoot with greater control over depth of field. Compact, precision 4x zoom lens; Intelligent IS The compact 28mm wide-angle 4x optical zoom lens uses Canon’s precision technology and advanced lens expertise for sharp, high-resolution images. The Intelligent IS system selects the optimum optical Image Stabilizer mode from 7 options to reduce camera shake and blur. 7.5 cm (3.0”) vari-angle LCD; OVF A 920k dot PureColor II VA LCD gives a clear and detailed view of the subject and allows comfortable shooting from a range of angles. A metal body and stainless steel chassis along with an optical viewfinder lets photographers shoot confidently and in their own style. Expert control with Full Manual and RAW Take control with the dedicated exposure compensation dial, or the front and rear control dials that can be used to adjust shooting settings such as aperture, shutter speed, and white balance. A range of manual modes and 14-bit RAW files allow control over the final image with the option to post-process. Full HD, HDMI Use the dedicated movie record button to capture superb, Full HD 1080p movies at 24fps with optical zoom and stereo sound. Enjoy high quality playback on an HDTV via the HDMI port. High-speed Burst HQ Capture split second action at 4.5 fps in a 6-frame full resolution burst using High-speed Burst HQ mode. Smart Auto, Multi-area WB Smart Auto automatically selects camera settings from 32 scenes for optimum results. Multi-area White Balance compensates for multiple light sources in the same scene for natural images. Extensive accessories Compatible with a range of EOS System accessories including Canon Speedlites and 58mm filters by using the Lens Filter Adapter. HDR mode and ND filter High Dynamic Range mode takes multiple exposures of a scene, combining them in-camera to deliver rich detail in shadow and highlight areas. The built-in 3-stop ND filter lets you use longer shutter speeds or wider apertures in bright light. Optional waterproof case Shoot underwater down to depths of 40m.
description-en_US-mobile: PowerShot G1 X - 14 MP, 1.5 CMOS, 4x zoom, 4:3, DIGIC 5, SD, SDHC, SDXC, 534 g, Black
name: Canon PowerShot G1 X

description-fr_FR-print:
Son capteur sensible CMOS APS-C de 20,3 mégapixels et son obturateur rapide de 1/8 000 s vous aident à capturer des images haute définition aux riches nuances en un clin d’œil. En outre, grâce à l’écran pivotant Clear AMOLED, vous pourrez prendre des clichés depuis n’importe quel angle et dans le plus grand confort. Par ailleurs, la connectivité Wi-Fi vous libère des enchevêtrements généralement causé par les fils et les câbles.
La réalité n’a jamais semblé aussi réelle.
Capteur APS-C de 20,3 mégapixels Le tout nouveau capteur CMOS APS-C de 20,3 mégapixels de niveau professionnel, entièrement personnalisé pour le système NX, produit des images qui peuvent rivaliser avec celles de n’importe quel appareil photo DSLR haut de gamme. En effet, chaque pixel dispose d’une large zone de capteur et reçoit davantage de lumière, ce qui garantit de faibles niveaux de bruit, une plage dynamique élevée et une différenciation des couleurs précise. De plus, la sensibilité accrue vous permet de prendre des clichés dans des conditions de faible éclairage, et ce granulation ni autre bruit. Qui plus est, le nouveau capteur vous offre des capacités de sortie vidéo Full HD.
Contrôlez votre vitesse
Obturateur rapide de 1/8 000 s La vitesse de l’obturateur peut faire la différence entre capturer une image emblématique ou rater une occasion qui ne se présente qu’une fois dans une vie. Dès lors, la vitesse de l’obturateur de 1/8 000 s du NX20 vous offre la flexibilité de prendre des clichés comme un pro, c’est-à-dire à des vitesses variées et avec de faibles expositions. Par ailleurs, l’obturateur du NX20 est même capable de se régler lui-même lorsqu’il détecte des facteurs environnementaux tels que la température et la direction de l’appareil photo. En outre, l’obturateur à plan focal contrôlé électroniquement réduit les erreurs d’exposition.
Un appareil photo qui dégaine plus vite que son ombrem.
Capture à haute vitesse Les capacités de capture à haute vitesse du NX20 vous permettent de saisir des moments furtifs et des objets qui se déplacent rapidement sans avoir besoin d’un capteur supplémentaire. Le système NX dispose d’une mise au point automatique ultra rapide capable de rivaliser avec ceux de la plupart des autres appareils photo. En outre, son tout nouvel algorithme de pointe vous propose une mise au point automatique plus rapide et plus précise. Le NX20 est capable de prendre 8 clichés à la seconde afin d’améliorer la prise en rafale et de réduire le délai d’obturation à seulement 40 ms.
Découvrez la véritable beauté de la vidéo HD.
Enregistrement de vidéo Full HD 1080p stéréo Grâce à ses capacités intégrées d’enregistrement de vidéo Full HD 1080 30p, le NX20 donne une touche artistique à la capture de vidéo avec un appareil photo. Changez d’angle de vue et de zoom en toute confiance. En effet, le capteur d’image CMOS sans miroir vous offre une mise au point précise, même lorsque vous filmez. De plus, afin de profiter d’une véritable expérience cinématographique, le système NX a été équipé d’un objectif 18-200 mm exclusivement pour la vidéo Full HD.
Partagez et sauvegardez simplement et instantanément
Connectivité Wi-Fi La connectivité Wi-Fi du NX20 vous permet de connecter votre appareil photo numérique à un réseau sans fil. Vous pouvez donc enregistrer des photos et des vidéos directement sur un ordinateur ou un service Cloud pendant que vous utilisez l'appareil, les envoyer par e-mail, les imprimer sans fil ou les transférer vers Facebook™, Twitter ou YouTube. Vous ne vous soucierez plus jamais de passer à côté d’un chef-d’œuvre, de manquer d’espace de stockage ou d’oublier d’emporter le câble adéquat.
description-fr_FR-mobile: Grâce à un savant équilibre entre résolution, performance et design, le Samsung NX20 libère le photographe professionnel qui sommeille en chacun de nous.

description-en_US-print: The Beauty of Simplicity.\nPerfect for photographers ready to make the move to digital SLR photography, the new EOS Rebel T3 delivers beautiful photos and video, speed, simplicity and fun. It features a 12.2 Megapixel CMOS Image Sensor and Canon DIGIC 4 Image Processor for richly detailed images and quick camera response. It has Canon's amazing 63-zone, Dual-layer metering for accurate exposures and features Canon's Basic+ function, HD video recording and Live View shooting, plus a convenient in-camera Feature Guide. The EOS Rebel T3 is as beautiful as the pictures it takes.

description-fr_FR-mobile: IXUS 240 HS PINK 16.1MP 10X ZOOM 8CM LCD IN
description-en_US-print: Digital Compact Camera Stay in touch with IXUS. With HS System and a huge touch screen for capturing any moment with ease, the slim IXUS 240 HS offers Wi-Fi connection for instantly sharing your stunning shots. Slim metal body; 24mm, 5x optical zoom With an elegantly slim metal body, you can take the IXUS 240 HS everywhere. Fit more in the frame with ultra-wide 24mm or get close to distant subjects with 5x optical zoom or up to 10x with ZoomPlus - an advanced zoom technology with more visible detail and sharpness than conventional digital zoom. HS System: 16.1 MP CMOS and DIGIC 5 HS System excels in low light so you can capture the real atmosphere of the moment without flash or tripod. Advanced DIGIC 5 processing and a high-sensitivity 16.1 Megapixel CMOS sensor give exceptional image quality in all situations. Intelligent IS Intelligent IS combats camera shake to ensure all your photos and videos are sharp and detailed even at full zoom or in low light. It automatically adjusts the optical Image Stabilizer to the scene from 7 modes to prevent blur. Wi-Fi for easy image sharing Wi-Fi lets you connect your camera wirelessly with other devices such as your smartphone, for quick and easy sharing of photos and movies with friends and family. Fingertip control A widescreen, high-resolution 8.0 cm (3.2") PureColor II Touch LCD with customisable smart touch interface provides intuitive control for fast, easy operation and pleasurable playback. Touch Shutter allows you to touch on the point of focus and then to trigger the shot. Full HD movies, HDMI Record superb Full HD (1080p) movies at 24fps with stereo sound and optical zoom. Intelligent IS keeps footage steady while filming, even at full zoom. An HDMI connection ensures high quality playback on an HDTV. Smart Auto (58 scenes) Effortlessly shoot great photos or movies with Smart Auto, which detects the scene and selects optimal settings from 58 variables (21 in movies). It also works with faces stored in Face ID and adapts shooting according to registered age – for example turning off flash and sounds when a sleeping baby is detected. Face ID Face ID registers up to 12 faces of family and friends, so they are automatically the focusing priority in every shot, and tags images with their names so they are easy to find in playback. High-speed shooting Use High-speed Burst to capture non-stop, fast-paced action or slow things down with Super Slow Motion Movie. Movie Digest (720p) Movie Digest records 4 seconds of video before each photo is shot and then joins all the recorded short clips into a bonus HD (720p) movie.
description-en_US-mobile: Digic5/iSAPS, 1/2.3 CMOS, 16.1MP, 5x/4x, 4608x3456, 1920x1080/24fps, TTL, ISO 100-3200, 3.2'' TFT Touch, PictBridge, 802.11b/g/n, USB, Mini-HDMI, PAL/NTSC, SD/SDHC/SDXC, Li-ion NB-11L, Pink
